column4: Cyferd is an agile digital transformation platform designed to accelerate your business into the future. Our platform empowers you to create scalable, secure business applications in the cloud without needing to code, making digital business transformation faster and more accessible than ever. Innovate, Automate, Integrate, Innovate Our scalable cloud infrastructure ensures your systems can adapt and grow with your business needs. Whether you need custom workflows or rapid application development, Cyferd empowers you to innovate at the speed of business, challenging industry norms with optimized solutions tailored to your unique requirements, ensuring that your business remains agile and competitive. Cyferd isn’t just a solution; it’s the tailored suit that evolves with your business, providing flexibility and scalability without compromise. Automate At Cyferd, we bring the power of AI directly into your business operations. Our AI-driven solutions enhance data analysis, automate repetitive tasks, and optimize processes for unprecedented efficiency gains. With Cyferd’s Neural Genesis AI, your business can innovate without limits, combining human ingenuity with cutting-edge technology. Integrate Our extensible solutions seamlessly integrate with your existing third-party applications, transforming your software ecosystem into a cohesive unit. By centralizing data across Cyferd apps within a unified layer, Cyferd breaks down barriers between departments and systems, turning data into a dynamic asset that fuels informed decision-making. With interoperability out-of-the-box and a fully integrated ecosystem, Cyferd ensures a smooth transition and unified view across your operations. --- By leveraging Cyferd, you're not just adopting a platform; you're embracing a transformative approach to business disruption. Empower your organization with Cyferd’s capabilities—automate with intelligence, integrate with ease, and innovate without limits.
column6: Cyferd – AI-Driven Digital Transformation Solutions We value your privacy We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. Customize Consent Preferences We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below. The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ... Always Active Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data. No cookies to display. Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features. No cookies to display. Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. No cookies to display. Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. No cookies to display. Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited previously and to analyze the effectiveness of the ad campaigns. column4: SMB Services is a trusted global financial services partner empowering startups, entrepreneurs, and small-to-medium-sized businesses with the power of AI-enhanced accounting, real-time business intelligence, and strategic tax and advisory. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with human expertise to help businesses lead with clarity, precision, and purpose. What Sets Us Apart • AI-powered intelligence, human-led strategy • Tailored solutions for entrepreneurs, startups & SMBs • End-to-end accounting, strategy, and business advisory under one roof • Real-time clarity in an unpredictable economy • People-first, purpose-driven, results-focused What We Do Finance & Accounting: From automated bookkeeping to CFO-level insights, we blend technology with expertise to unlock clarity, speed, and control. Business Intelligence & Analytics: We turn raw data into sharp insights. Our AI-powered dashboards and analytics help you see trends, track performance, and act faster. Financial Planning & Strategy: We craft adaptive financial roadmaps aligned with long-term business goals, because planning for tomorrow starts today. What We Really Do Beyond services, systems, and strategies, our true work begins with connection. We don’t just show up with answers. We show up to genuinely understand the questions. We lead with curiosity, stand with conviction, and commit fully to your journey. • We Listen. • We Ask. • We Challenge. • We Deliver. • And above all, we Stand Beside You. SMB Services is your partner for financial clarity, intelligent strategy, and sustainable growth. Let’s build the future of your business together. P.S. Subscribe to our weekly newsletter (SMB Edge) for fresh insights, smart tools, and ahead-of-the-curve strategies.

column4: HappyRobot's AI workers conduct communication-based tasks like emails, messages, or phone calls. Our focus is in logistics and supply chain which means our AI workers are mostly handling the operations of moving freight including sales, track & trace, accounting, and support. These tasks don’t end in a conversation - we’re also extracting valuable data and leveraging that data for things like targeting prospects or understanding pricing and demand in an all-in-one control panel for your business. HappyRobot's platform was built as a developer tool, so although we’re experts in common logistics use cases, any custom workflow can be built. If your team is spending time sending emails or making calls, we can automate that workflow by giving AI access to the right data and good instructions. Backed by a16z and YC, we recently closed our Series A and are scaling rapidly. If you're excited about transforming an industry that represents over 10% of global GDP & impacting the speed & cost of access to goods all over the world, join us!

An enterprise solution to automate communication across channels with AI workers that integrate with your systems, manage conversations, & log data. Launching Bridge: the all-in-one control panel for your operations. Book a demo How it works AI workers autonomously manage communication... Deciding what to do AI workers are scanning for opportunities or signals to take action: an incoming call, tendered load, or upcoming arrival window. Having dynamic conversations AI workers dynamically handle communication in a natural, conversational flow: conducting a phone call, putting people on hold, or exchanging emails and texts. Keeping things moving Work isn't done when the conversation ends - data is extracted, logged into your system, and the process continues to the next step, potentially off to another AI worker. column4: Omni is a business intelligence and embedded analytics platform that empowers everyone—regardless of technical ability—to easily analyze data using SQL, spreadsheets, AI, or point-and-click interfaces. It is built on a semantic layer that makes sure every insight is accurate and dependable. Beyond powering internal analytics, Omni makes it easy for businesses to offer highly customizable in-product analytics to its customers.

column4: At Adept, we are building a future where AI helps every employee focus on meaningful work. In today's digital landscape, Adept seamlessly integrates into existing workflows and business processes, executing tasks across the software tools and systems employees use every day. Powered by our best-in-class proprietary model, our tool navigates systems to extract, transform, and populate information into forms, websites, and SaaS applications reliably at scale, all while adhering to a company’s business rules and processes. column6: extend We've raised $17M in funding! 🎉 ( Read Here ) The Modern Document Processing Cloud Turn your documents into high quality data, achieve unmatched accuracy, and ship custom document automation in days, not months. Without Extend Lower quality results, significant implementation times, and continued R&D investment Accuracy ~80% Live in Months? With Extend Rapidly achieve accuracy and free up your team to innovate, not maintain infra Accuracy > 95 % Live in Days The new standard in document intelligence. Traditional OCR wasn't built for today's challenges. We rebuilt document AI from the ground up with LLMs to handle your most complex use cases with unrivaled performance. Next-gen document understanding Extend's models are engineered specifically for complex documents, including tables, signatures, handwriting, images, and more. Process any document type with exceptional accuracy, from structured PDFs to degraded scans. Rapid path to high accuracy Skip months of trial and error. Use Extend’s battle tested Extraction, Classification, and Splitting processors to reach > 95% accuracy quickly. Empower your domain experts Enable technical & non-technical members to quickly iterate, review results, and improve accuracy with Extend's built-in tooling. Continuously Improving Pipelines Turn every review into a teaching moment. Extend incorporates corrections to improve accuracy and adapt to your documents with each iteration. column4: TrueFoundry is a Cloud-native PaaS for Machine learning teams to build, deploy and ship ML/LLM Applications on their own cloud/on-prem Infra in a faster, scalable, cost efficient way with the right governance controls, allowing them to achieve 90% faster time to value than other teams. TrueFoundry abstracts out the engineering required and offers GenAI accelerators - LLM PlayGround, LLM Gateway, LLM Deploy, LLM Finetune, RAG Playground and Application Templates that can enable an organisation to speed up the layout of their overall GenAI/LLMOps framework. Enterprises can plug and play these accelerators with their internal systems as well as build on top of our accelerators to enable a LLMOps platform of their choice to the GenAI developers. TrueFoundry is modular and completely API driven, has native integration with popular tools in the market like LangChain, VectorDBs, GuardRails, etc. TrueFoundry works with 25+ Fortune 500 Companies as well as hi-Tech midmarket companies including likes of WadhwaniAI, WhatFix, 2 Fortune 100 healthcare, Games24x7, AvisoAI etc. TrueFoundry is backed by Sequoia, Eniac & Angels like Naval Ravikant, Anthony Goldbloom & 50+ AI & ML leaders from top tech companies, Fortune 500 CXOs and founders at Unicorns like AlphaSense, Innovaccer, WhatFix, Rubrik etc.

column4: Oasis is the market leading platform for non-human identity management. Our mission is to fortify cybersecurity defenses by enabling enterprises to efficiently secure non-human identities throughout their lifecycle. The shift to hybrid multi-cloud, microservices, agile development and AI-driven business process automation has led to the exponential growth of non-human identities, completely changing the identity fabric of enterprise environments. We created the first enterprise platform purpose-built to address the security and operational challenges of Non-human Identities. Our platform empowers security, engineering and developers teams to improve security posture, implement stronger governance and simplify compliance by taking control of the non-human identity lifecycle without risking system resilience and without operational complexity.
column6: Non Human Identity Management | OASIS Security Request a Demo THE CHALLENGES 95% of identities are non-human 46% of enterprises were breached via NHI Traditional IAM is not enough Introducing Oasis NHI Security Cloud Oasis empowers security and identity teams to take control of the NHI lifecycle Request a Demo Ready for The Hybrid Cloud NHI Providers Azure, AWS, GCP, Ping, Okta, MS Active Directory, and more Vaults Hashi Corp, Azure Key Vault, AWS KMS, GCP, and more PaaS/SaaS Snowflake, Databricks, GitHub, Salesforce and many more Platform Features Request a Demo See Gain comprehensive insight into all identities and their usage across your environment by integrating multiple data sources beyond your Identity Provider (IdP). Secure Reduce perimeter risk with tailored security policies, advanced analytics to detect threats, and a continuous assessment process for maintaining a strong security posture. Govern Take control of the identity lifecycle with policy-based automation, eliminating slow email-based processes and streamlining workflows across your infrastructure. column4: Tessell is redefining the future of enterprise data infrastructure with an AI-native, multi-cloud database-as-a-service (DBaaS) platform built for both transactional and analytical workloads. In a world where data is fragmented across clouds, tools, and teams, Tessell unifies the full lifecycle of database management into a single, intelligent control plane. By combining automated provisioning, AI-driven optimization, zero-downtime operations, and conversational data management (CoDaM), Tessell empowers enterprises to modernize at scale—without complexity or lock-in. Unlike traditional database platforms that require extensive tuning, licensing, and DevOps overhead, Tessell delivers a seamless experience that reduces costs by up to 45% and increases performance by over 50%. Its support for open-source engines (like PostgreSQL and MySQL), coupled with native integrations across AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, and OCI, gives organizations the flexibility and power to run data-intensive applications anywhere. Tessell is trusted by Fortune 500 companies and digital-native enterprises alike to power mission-critical applications, accelerate cloud adoption, and enable real-time, AI-driven decision-making. Backed by leading investors including WestBridge Capital and Lightspeed, and having recently raised a $60M Series B, Tessell is rapidly scaling its vision to make data management conversational, intelligent, and universally accessible. In short, Tessell is building the future of cloud-native data ecosystems.

column4: Flox is a software development platform that lets developers, platform engineers, and operators focus on building fast with reproducible environments that span the enterprise software development life cycle.
column6: Flox | Your dev environment, everywhere Your dev environment, everywhere. Create development environments with all the dependencies you need and easily share them with colleagues. Work consistently across the entire software lifecycle. Press to move the modules Flox installs packages into virtual environments you can layer, extend and share. new_study % flox init ▌ ▌ ✨ Created environment 'new_study' (aarch64-darwin) Next: $ flox search <package> <- Search for a package $ flox install <package> <- Install a package into an environment $ flox activate <- Enter the environment $ flox edit <- Add environment variables and shell hooks new_study % ▌ 1 Get Up To Speed One-Command Project Setup Flox makes it easy to join a new project, so that means the end of gigantic README files with complex setup procedures. Using Flox, projects can make it as easy as one command - and you don't have to worry that following the instructions for one project will break another. ~/projects/node_project — flox activate % cd node_project/ ✅ You are now using the environment node_project at /vol/homes/floxfan/node_project To stop using this environment, type 'exit' ~/projects/node_project — flox activate % cd node_project/ ▌ [node-project] % flox ▌ ▌ ⠓ Getting ready to use environment node_project at /vol/homes/floxfan/node_project ✅ You are now using the environment node_project at /vol/homes/floxfan/node_project To stop using this environment, type 'exit' flox [node-project] % ▌ v18.18.2 [node-project] % ▌ 2 Work Consistently Your Tools, Everywhere Flox environments can quickly be synchronized and shared, even across architectures, so you can skip past all of the “but it works on my machine” stuff. With Flox, it’s the same environment for everyone, no matter what they use. Kat Morris macOS Miro Soroka Linux Rory McDill Ubuntu Jane Davis macOS 3 Work Flexibly Environments With All the Comforts of $HOME Flox environments are not locked inside a box. They can be layered on top of your existing operating system, tools, and configuration - or even each other. You can quickly add the new tools your project needs while still using everything you brought with you. What our users say People seem to love what Flox does. Join our community Britt “Every developer has their own long-lived VM and because of that, people have made minor modifications here and there to the system. And so we all kind of have our own bespoke development environments that famously cause the “it works on my machine” problem to happen a lot.” Britt Gresham @demophoon Eric Flox is all I can expect from a package manager: simple, reliable, efficient, flexible. I can now, without any fear, switch from one project to another, from one programming language to the next. Even better, I can share my environments with other team members so that "it works on my machine, it should work on yours" has a greater chance of success! Eric T @etorreborre Adam "As most developers have experienced, managing environments and dependencies is too complex and chaotic. Flox is a ground up new approach that will undoubtedly become a key part of future toolchains.” Adam Gross CEO of Vimeo & former CEO of Heroku @adam_g Adam “I can see the immediate value Flox provides, especially sharing development tooling for onboarding and bootstrapping shared development environments.” Adam Whitlock Director of Software Engineering at Scuba Analytics @alloydwhitlock Guy “The environments we use to run software are massively bloated, making them risky and slow. Flox gives us a lean and secure alternative, plus makes it easy - an excellent double win” Guy Podjarny Co-Founder at Snyk @guypod Justin Hard, intrinsically complex problems, like the ones around build, reproducibility and environments for our software stacks have to offer non incremental change to be adopted. Flox helps bring simplicity to this space, making it approachable, while not hiding the opportunities and power in the tools.” Justin Cormack CTO at Docker @justincormack Luke “The learning curve of Nix is often intimidating and has always prevented me from convincing my colleagues to use Nix for day-to-day development. Flox successfully marries the simplicity of traditional package managers with the reproducible, hermetic foundation of Nix. The imperative interface for defining declarative state is brilliant -- all I ever wanted. Every developer can now take advantage of consistent shared development environments without having to first wrap their heads around Nix.” Luke Rewega Software Engineer at Buf @lrewega Britt “Every developer has their own long-lived VM and because of that, people have made minor modifications here and there to the system. column4: Modern B2B billing, powered by AI. Generate precise, timely invoices with automated workflows that eliminate manual input.
column6: JustPaid - AI Revenue Operations Platform Startup Office Hours: AMA with a Two-Time YC Founder Register for event Pricing Page Builder Accounts Receivable Contract & Billing AI Reminder AI Contract Management Customer Invoicing Revenue Insights Upsells & Renewals Founders Startups Mid-Market Enterprise Healthcare AI Companies Directory CFO Developers Accounting About Pricing Blog Events Product Demos Podcast Compare Careers Community Help Center Learning Center Backed by Combinator (W23) Your autonomous AI billing agent for complex financial operations Built from the ground up to handle complexity, not stitched together like the rest. No credit card required. CFOs waste valuable time on billing, contracts, and collections. JustPaid.ai automates everything. It reads contracts, sends invoices, and more. No more spreadsheet chaos. You get paid faster, with less work. Powering the best teams Powering the best teams Automate complex decisions AI collaboration enhances your creativity Modern architecture, modern results. Built for today's startups and growing businesses, our platform integrates seamlessly with your existing tech stack while providing the flexibility to scale as you evolve. Complexity made simple. Your cash flow takes a hit when payments are delayed by 30+ days. Simplifying invoicing ensures quick payment and financial stability. Strategic Financial Insights. Transform billing data into actionable intelligence. See real-time cash flow, customer behavior, and revenue trends in real-time for faster decisions. AI-powered precision. Say goodbye to billing errors and revenue leakage. Our autonomous agent continuously learns from your data, ensuring accurate invoicing every time while identifying opportunities to optimize your revenue streams. Unlock Effortless Revenue Management for Your Startup As a startup founder, you're juggling investor expectations, rapid scaling, and unpredictable cash flow. JustPaid automates complex billing, invoicing, and collections so you can focus on growth, not spreadsheets. One Platform for Sales-Led and Product-Led Growth Billing Whether you're driving enterprise deals (SLG) or enabling self-serve subscriptions (PLG), JustPaid unifies it all. Automate provisioning, metering, and upgrades without adding headcount. Seamless Revenue Reporting Generate board-ready reports in seconds with real-time dashboards tracking revenue, burn rate, runway, and cash flow. No more manual data pulls—impress stakeholders with accurate, automated insights. Automated Payment Chasing to Get Paid Faster Stop wasting hours on follow-ups. Our AI agent sends personalized reminders and integrates with payment gateways to reduce DSO by up to 30% while you focus on building. Quick and Easy Complex Invoicing Send customized invoices for any deal structure—usage-based, tiered, or hybrid—without coding. Our AI analyzes contracts instantly, ensuring precision so you close deals faster. AI-Powered Autonomy Unlike patched-together solutions, our platform learns from your data to optimize invoicing, predict payment risks, and handle everything from contract analysis to collections without human intervention. Compliance and Security Built-In Stay audit-ready with automated revenue recognition (ASC 606/IFRS 15), tax handling, and secure data—essential for investor trust and global expansion. Built for modern finance teams that demand more From startups to established enterprises, finance leaders trust JustPaid to transform their billing operations into a strategic advantage. Our autonomous AI billing agent supports your custom systems and complex pricing models without compromise. Monitor burn rate, revenue, and runway across systems with live updates and no manual work. Combine multiple billing systems into one revenue dashboard. Accountants Centralize billing, speed up workflows, and eliminate costly delays. Manage your entire workflow from a single platform. Financial experts Track prepaid expenses, sync amortization, and let JustPaid AI manage collections and follow-ups so your team doesn’t have to. What used to take hours of manual work is now fully automated and error-free. Their team understands the nuances of fast-growing businesses, and the platform feels like it was built exactly for companies like ours. Partnering with JustPaid has freed up our time and allowed us to focus entirely on scaling. column4: At Flow, AI isn't just a feature—it's the core of everything we do. We are transforming the wholesale insurance industry by building a futuristic insurance brokerage where AI powers every aspect of the experience. With advanced AI features already live in production and actively used by our brokers, we are pioneering Wholesale 3.0, equipping brokers with cutting-edge tools to provide unparalleled service. We are creating an ecosystem of AI agents designed to streamline processes and enhance decision-making in the insurance landscape. The industry relies heavily on text—emails, files, and documents—making Generative AI a perfect fit for solving its challenges. Flow leverages AI to deliver meaningful insights, deep analysis, and white-glove support for every transaction, no matter the deal size. By combining human expertise with Platformless AI, we are bringing back the art of wholesale insurance while eliminating the need for outdated portals. In the past seven months, we’ve grown 250% month-over-month(!) and are forecasting even more massive growth. We’re a Series A startup with over $20M raised from top investors like Lightspeed, MunichRe Ventures, and industry angels.
column6: Flow - People Who Care Technology That Delivers Wholesal﻿e 3.0 White glove service, powered by Platformless AI. We are a specialty commercial insurance brokerage that is built to deliver enterprise-grade service to every single deal, no matter the premium. Their team is responsive and knowledgeable, providing us with quick turnaround on quotes and excellent guidance on coverage solutions. Their access to key insurance markets helps us compete on our unique accounts. It has streamlined my day to day so we can focus on delivering a high level of service to our clients. Michelle Senior Account Manager Working with Flow is easy and seamless. They have the market reach and their team is knowledgeable and extremely professional. They have become the go-to market for our agency regarding difficult to place and higher-limits Professional Liability and Cyber Liability coverage for our unique clients. I had two tough placements with very limited underwriting information and Flow worked with me to produce not just one but multiple competitive quotes. Our clients were extremely pleased and we were able to place the business. Without Flow, this would have been an extremely time intensive and frustrating process for both ourselves and our clients. column4: Mentum is an AI-powered assistant transforming procurement and supply chain processes for manufacturers and consumer goods companies. We automate strategic sourcing for complex projects and new product introductions by organizing data from emails, documents, and ERP systems and automating workflows. Trusted by leaders in industries like energy, CPG, and retail, Mentum helps procurement teams work faster, cut costs, and make smarter decisions. Backed by Gradient Ventures (Google’s AI Fund) and Y Combinator.
column6: Mentum Mentum Book a Demo Source-to-Pay AI Agents Accelerate sourcing decisions, unlock COGS savings, and gain real-time visibility, no matter the complexity of your sourcing events. No supplier portal required: 100% supplier coverage. Talk to the Founders 5 Quotes received 20 min ago Backed by top AI investors: Streamline Every Step of Your Sourcing Process. See how our customers use Mentum to increase supply chain visibility and turn their buyers into strategic sourcing teams. Extract and Compare Supplier Quotes with Ease 1 Automatically pull relevant data from supplier emails and attachments—no more manual sorting. 2 Conduct AI-powered, apple-to-apple comparisons of quotes or bids- no matter the formats suppliers send their information. 3 Cite sources for full transparency, showing exactly which documents and data informed your analysis. 4 Manage complex communications across R&D, procurement, finance, and suppliers across multiple email threads. Create RFI, RFQ, and RFP Packages in Minutes 1 Quickly drag and drop or pull specifications to generate RFQ, RFI, or RFP packages. 2 Automatically generate supplier requirements, ensuring you track the right commercial and technical data. 3 Standardize what suppliers need to deliver and minimize back-and-forth clarifications. Find the Right Suppliers from Existing Data 1 Use historical email communications and ERP records to identify the best suppliers for your needs. 2 Leverage AI to surface supplier performance trends, pricing history, and reliability scores. 3 Expand your supplier network with recommendations tailored to your past data and project goals. Monitor Supplier Communication and Maintain Traceability 1 Track when suppliers open emails, reply, and how long it takes—streamline follow-ups and boost efficiency. 2 Maintain a full audit trail of sourcing activity for compliance and accountability. 3 Centralize all sourcing documentation in one place with clear version control. Building blocks for your strategic source-to-pay journey Leverage AI to expand beyond RFQs to other use cases across your supply chain workflows. Purchase Order Status Tracking Track POs from issuance to delivery with real-time updates from suppliers and ERP systems. Get instant alerts for delays or changes to ensure on-time delivery. Purchase Order Acknowledgement Automatically extract and track PO confirmations from supplier emails. Keep complete records for compliance and dispute resolution. Invoice Reconciliation Automate three-way matching between POs, invoices, and receipts. Quickly spot and resolve discrepancies to prevent payment delays. Project Management Prioritize critical tasks based on real-time updates from email and ERP systems. Detect and manage issues early to ensure smooth operations. Supplier List Management Use AI to extract and enrich supplier data from historical communications. Automatically identify potential new suppliers based on your needs. Centralized Requisitions Streamline approvals by consolidating all requests and updates in one place. Get clear visibility into requisition status and next steps. Unify Your Supply Chain Systems and Data. Safely. Seamless Connections Connect to Office 365, Gmail, Google Drive, and more in minutes Sync data with PowerBI and ERPs like NetSuite, SAP, and Dynamics 365 Quick setup with zero IT complexity Enterprise-grade security ITAR compliant and SOC II Type 1 certified for aerospace and defense End-to-end encryption exceeding industry standards Book a Demo Simplify Sourcing with AI Precision Mentum streamlines your sourcing process by transforming how your team handles data, ensuring accuracy, and delivering actionable insights effortlessly. Uncover Key Insights from Your Team's Inbox AI automatically identifies relevant emails and attachments, saving you from digging through clutter. 1 Instantly identify emails and attachments critical to your sourcing needs. 2 Filter out irrelevant content to focus on what matters most. 3 Extract and organize key details, making them ready for immediate action. Structure Data for Seamless Integration Transform unstructured data into custom formats that fit your workflow and systems. • Convert emails, PDFs, and spreadsheets into clean, structured formats. • Tailor outputs to match ERP templates or analytics systems. • Minimize errors and maintain consistency across all data points. Verify with Confidence Keep control with human oversight, ensuring every detail is accurate and traceable. • See exactly where AI sourced each piece of data with clear citations. • Address flagged low-confidence results quickly with AI recommendations. • Maintain an audit trail of changes for accountability and compliance. column4: Designed for enterprise revenue organizations, Poggio (“poe-jee-oh”) is the pioneer and leader in AI-powered account intelligence. Poggio arms GTM teams—people + AI agents—with tailored points of view (POVs) to show up smarter than competitors & win. Poggio’s AI agents discover, synthesize, and contextualize data from thousands of first and third party sources to deliver a concise view of everything to know about a customer. Poggio then applies a company’s unique differentiation, proof points, battle cards, and more to deliver tailored POVs, compelling narratives, powerful business cases, and actionable account plans that position GTM teams—people + AI agents—to speak in the customer’s language, confidently lead with value, and attach to the customer’s top priority—so customers buy, buy their solution, and buy it now. Poggio continually updates the intelligence to deliver the most deeply researched, always current, always relevant POVs, available on demand 24/7. Enterprise grade and delivered at scale, Poggio is trusted by large global revenue teams. Poggio’s platform is easily configurable to map to an organization’s unique GTM motion and value framework with uncompromising security, privacy, and compliance that meet the most rigorous enterprise requirements. Backed by Accel Partners and Spark Capital, Poggio makes Account Intelligence an org-wide core competency, helping revenue leaders unlock value selling at scale and accelerate revenue growth. Bring revenue into the intelligence age at poggio.io.
column6: Poggio · Sales AI Show up smarter Poggio AI agents leverage thousands of data sources to build an executive-level POV for every account. Account intel at scale, 24/7 Poggio keeps POVs up to date and alerts you to the changes your customers care about, so you can stay focused on their priorities. Welcome to Poggio Enterprise account intelligence

column6: Quill - AI-powered SEC filing platform Quill Products SEC Viewer Excel Extension Earnings Calls Pricing Features Press Sign In Quill AI A delightful way to update Excel models Get started USED BY ANALYSTS AT FEATURED ON EXCEL EXTENSION Update any model in one click Quill’s Excel Addin pulls numbers straight from the earnings release into your Excel model the moment it’s available. Updates work on your model, as is . With Quill, there’s no copy-paste, no formatting, and no templates required. Just plug it in, and watch as your existing models fill with accurate, timely data—every single quarter. Stay focused on making smart trades, not on cleaning up spreadsheets. Contextualize any model Quill’s Excel Addin highlights your model and identifies any outliers. Then, it pulls context from the relevant filings to explain the figures. WEB APP Extract key information from filings just by asking Leverage Quill's financially-tuned AI to quickly answer questions about any company’s public investor materials. Each response includes state-of-the-art sentence-level source citations that take you back to the relevant filings. This also prevents the AI from hallucinating information. Unlike ChatGPT, which has a training cutoff date, Quill always has up-to-date financial data. Chat Ask about companies and their 10K/10Q/8K filings. You can also extract numerical data into spreadsheets. No chats. Use the chat box at the bottom. Historical financials for a fraction of the cost Quill has complete tabular historical financial data, collected and organized by our in-house models. Each number comes with a link to its location in the original filing, making the data easily verifiable. All data is Excel-downloadable, so you’ll never manually fill in historicals again. Access real-time SEC Filings, earnings call transcripts, insider transactions, and investor presentations. As soon as filings are uploaded to the SEC, they are available on Quill. Files are highlightable in our in-house document viewer, and highlights are shareable for easy collaboration with team members. Whenever a company you’re tracking releases a filing, Quill Alerts will email you with a customizable analysis of the filing. Quill can also send you an updated version of your metrics spreadsheet the minute the information is released on the SEC. Earnings call metrics/guidance Quill provides any of the company's results and guidance, along with sources for those claims, and management's commentary for the results/guidance. This is automatable and exportable to Excel. $NVDA reported metrics (last quarter): Metric Value Key drivers Q1 Revenue Revenue of $26 billion was up 18% sequentially and up 262% year-on-year and well above our outlook of $24 billion. Strong demand for NVIDIA Hopper GPU computing platform. Q1 Data Center Revenue Data Center revenue of $22.6 billion was a record, up 23% sequentially and up 427% year-on-year. Strong demand for NVIDIA Hopper GPU computing platform. Q1 Compute Revenue from Data Center Compute revenue grew more than 5x and networking revenue more than 3x from last year. Strong growth driven by all customer types. Q1 Networking Revenue from Data Center Compute revenue grew more than 5x and networking revenue more than 3x from last year. Strong growth driven by all customer types. Q1 Automotive Revenue Automotive Revenue was $329 million, up 17% sequentially and up 11% year-on-year. Growth driven by ramp of AI cockpit solutions and self-driving platforms. Q1 Gaming Revenue Gaming revenue of $2.65 billion was down 8% sequentially and up 18% year-on-year. Seasonal decline and year-on-year growth. Q1 Pro Visualization Revenue Revenue of $427 million was down 8% sequentially and up 45% year-on-year. No reason found Q1 Gross Margin (GAAP) GAAP gross margin expanded sequentially to 78.4%. Lower inventory targets. Q1 Gross Margin (non-GAAP) non-GAAP gross margins to 78.9% on lower inventory targets. Lower inventory targets. Q1 GAAP Operating Expenses Sequentially, GAAP operating expenses were up 10%. Higher compensation-related costs and increased investments. Q1 Non-GAAP Operating Expenses non-GAAP operating expenses were up 13%, primarily reflecting higher compensation-related costs and increased compute and infrastructure investments. Higher compensation-related costs and increased investments. Q1 Shareholder Returns In Q1, we returned $7.8 billion to shareholders in the form of share repurchases and cash dividends. No reason found Q1 Dividend Increase We are also increasing our dividend by 150%. No reason found Q2 Revenue Guidance Total revenue is expected to be $28 billion, plus or minus 2%. Growth on all market platforms. Q2 GAAP Gross Margin Guidance GAAP and non-GAAP gross margins are expected to be 74.8% and 75.5%, respectively, plus or minus 50 basis points, consistent with our discussion last quarter. No reason found Q2 Non-GAAP Gross Margin Guidance GAAP and non-GAAP gross margins are expected to be 74.8% and 75.5%, respectively, plus or minus 50 basis points, consistent with our discussion last quarter. No reason found Q2 GAAP Operating Expenses Guidance GAAP and non-GAAP operating expenses are expected to be approximately $4 billion and $2.8 billion, respectively. Full year OpEx is expected to grow in the low 40% range. No reason found Q2 Non-GAAP Operating Expenses Guidance GAAP and non-GAAP operating expenses are expected to be approximately $4 billion and $2.8 billion, respectively. Full year OpEx is expected to grow in the low 40% range. No reason found Q2 Tax Rate Guidance GAAP and non-GAAP tax rates are expected to be 17%, plus or minus 1%, excluding any discrete items. What are my card design options? CapitalOS cards are co-branded with your brand. We will be happy to support you in the design process. Do you support Apple Wallet and Android Wallet? Yes! Contact sales and we will get back to you as fast as we can.

Nectar is fully cloud-based, meaning you can securely access your practice’s data from anywhere and from any device, whether you're in the office, on the go, or working from home. All you need is an internet connection. And we seamlessly include features that practices commonly have to purchase as one-off solutions - like 2-way SMS, AI note-taking, client portals, robust online scheduling, digital whiteboards, and payment processing (with the lowest embedded payment fees in the industry!) How does Nectar help save time and reduce paperwork? With Nectar, your team can automate appointment scheduling, billing, patient records, inventory management, and more — reducing the need for manual paperwork and multiple data entries. Our intuitive platform allows you to access important information anytime, from any device, ensuring your entire team stays organized and in sync. How does Nectar help my practice increase revenue? By automating routine tasks like scheduling, billing, and reminders, your team can spend less time on administrative work and more time seeing patients. Advanced direct online scheduling makes it easy to get patients in the door. Our seamless deposit collection and automated SMS confirmations and reminders reduce no-shows. Nectar also helps you capture missed invoices and increase services offered to individual patients. How long does it take to get started with Nectar? SELECT users.name, orders.order_date, SUM(order_items.quantity * products.price) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id JOIN order_items ON orders.id = order_items.order_id JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.id WHERE orders.order_date >= '2023-01-01' GROUP BY users.name, orders.order_date ORDER BY total_amount DESC LIMIT 10; Alex Jen Automated catalog Sync sources, metrics and dashboards with up-to-date metadata and documentation. food service roles in which associates choose their shifts and managers optimize their staffing in ReadyOn. 5x more applicants ~50% reduction in shift labor cost What our users have to say Gamechanger “Choose your shifts” working arrangement drove record applicant flow for our roles Food service leader “Easy” button for staffing “Set it and forget it” scheduling for managers. Automated backfills and standbys help me cover for no-shows or cancellations HR leader Engagement It’s great to communicate and send automated reminders through an app Hospitality leader Frequently Asked Questions What is ReadyOn and who is it built for? ReadyOn is a platform for hiring and offering flexible work arrangements to your frontline workers in a modern app. We serve the largest enterprises who have hard-to-hire roles, high reliance on staffing agencies, and an interest in providing more schedule flexibility to their frontline workers. Is ReadyOn a staffing agency? What is the work arrangement? ReadyOn is a software platform, not a staffing agency. We drive applicants to your open roles to be hired as W2 “flex-time” workers of your organization. First popularized by Amazon, ”flex-time” workers are part-time W2 workers who choose their shifts each week – typically working below the benefits-eligibility hours threshold. How are applicants found, screened, and onboarded into my workforce? ReadyOn operates a job board and job advertising platform that targets workers seeking flexible work, enabling us to generate 2-5x more applicants than traditional job postings. You set the screening criteria and application process to ensure new candidates meet your hiring criteria without lowering the bar. Our platform then automatically screens and nudges applicants through your process -- working on behalf of your hiring managers to get them hired and onboarded. We connect into the leading Applicant Tracking Systems (e.g., Workday, SAP SuccessFactors) for enhanced automations. How does ReadyOn work with unionized workforces? Unionized workforces often have complex scheduling requirements and value flexibility for their members. ReadyOn automates scheduling processes required in collective bargaining agreements and creates an additional classification of “flex-time” union workers who have more flexibility and can work across nearby locations. How are ”flex-time” associates managed? ReadyOn has a suite of tools for supervisors to manage an increasingly dynamic workforce. Self-scheduling, notifications, performance tracking, recommendations, and predictions put staffing on auto-pilot so your managers can spend time on higher value tasks. Calculate the value of embracing flexibility Wages and related labor costs often comprise the largest expense for frontline employers, with room for 10-25% optimization. Get in touch to calculate the opportunity for your operations. Request information

column4: Welcome to Cobalt – the world's first AI-powered platform that transforms enterprise integrations into a fast, simple, and efficient experience. At Cobalt, we believe that connecting your software systems shouldn’t be a drawn-out, complicated process. Our innovative solution replaces tedious manual coding and expensive consulting with smart AI agents built on a robust, embedded iPaaS. Our AI agents quickly learn the unique workings of your enterprise software—from understanding complex APIs to configuring custom workflows—so that integration tasks that once took weeks or months are now completed in minutes. With our no-code interface, even complex tasks become easy to manage, enabling your team to focus on what really matters: growing your business. Cobalt is designed to seamlessly embed within your existing software ecosystem. Whether you’re in supply chain management, financial planning, or business intelligence, our platform delivers tailor-made integrations that connect your systems flawlessly. By automating the heavy lifting traditionally handled by system integrators, we not only speed up the process but also reduce the risk of errors and costly delays. Our solution creates a network of connected systems, ensuring that each integration adds value and builds upon the last. This means that as you adopt more applications, your system becomes smarter, more intuitive, and better equipped to support your evolving business needs. Join us on our mission to revolutionize enterprise integrations. Discover how Cobalt can help you achieve seamless connectivity, agile operations, and a competitive edge—all while making integration effortless. Connect with us today to learn more about how we’re making the complex simple and turning integration challenges into growth opportunities.

column4: Powerhouse AI is redefining warehouse work by automating traditional manual counting and checking tasks, resulting in much faster operations without human error. With the goal to make warehousing up to 40% faster and eliminate human error. We’re doing this with a software that only requires a mobile device. Our application fully digitising core warehouse workflows like inbound or stocktake. We use the power of computer vision (your camera) to automatically count boxes, reads all your logistics documents and identify all your inventory (either if it has a label or not) Working with the world's largest companies and 3PL's and backed by investors like Y Combinator and Entrepreneur First.

column4: Software has transformed completely in the last 2 decades: It’s API-first, cloud-native, AI-assisted and continuously deployed. Security hasn’t kept up, slowing down teams, deployment, and revenue. Reactive and manual security lead to security incidents, data breaches, bloated teams, compliance fines, and eroded brand value. Founded by a Former Cisco Engineering Director, Levo was built to ensure Security never slows down, drains revenue, but instead enables it. We proactively embed API Security best practices into your Developer workflows so better, more secure, compliant software is shipped faster. Levo is designed to be efficient, non-invasive. It operates with minimal cloud resources, so you can secure multiple attack surfaces without ballooning headcount or spend. Our intelligent data processing layer ensures no sensitive data ever leaves your environment. API Security is our first stride towards our vision of a world where Security and Growth are never trade-offs.

Read more → Recognized as a pioneer in API Security Recognized by Industry Practitioner James Berthoty for eBPF innovation, challenging security status quo Read more → 1 2 Levo is how security-first enterprises protect customer data Without slowing down innovation, revenue and teams Security success without escalating cloud costs or compliance risks Levo is the only resource-efficient and privacy-preserving API Security Platform Loved by DevSecOps, compliance & finance teams alike! Built for efficiency Engineered with precision, Levo’s Satellite captures and processes only what’s necessary. Saving $100-500k in cloud costs even when deployed in the most demanding enterprise environments. No vendor-induced security concerns Less than 1% of your data is sent to our SaaS, compared to vendors who process all customer data within their SaaS No compromise on privacy Only metadata and OpenAPI specs are sent to our SaaS platform, and no PII ever leaves your environment Minimal resource requirement All 6 use cases performed with half a core CPU and 0.5GB RAM even at large enterprise scale High configuration flexibility Both our sensor and satellite can be configured directly from the UI saving time and cloud resources that would otherwise be spent relying on engineers. Compliance enabler, not blocker Ensure data remains within your jurisdiction with self-hosting/on-prem options. Frequently asked questions What is Levo? Levo offers an API Security Platform that automatically and continuously discovers, documents, tests, and monitors APIs—essential practices endorsed by OWASP and compliance frameworks like PCI. Due to the complexity of recommended security practices, over 60% of enterprises lack a robust API security strategy. This gap has led to widespread API breaches, with 57% of organizations experiencing incidents in the past two years. Levo has become indispensable to enterprise teams as we save them : A. 2-3 quarters of Developer bandwidth and >$1 million annual staffing costs B. $11 million in incident response costs by preventing/minimizing API breaches. Are there agentless instrumentation methods available? Yes, we offer a dozen-plus agentless instrumentation options that plug into your existing infrastructure and tools in addition to our eBPF and PCAP Sensors. Both agent and agentless deployments have their advantages and trade-offs. Our traffic-based instrumentation provides some of the most detailed and accurate inventory and documentation available. Yet its effectiveness depends on traffic quality. Since WAFs and many other edge-based tools capture edge traffic—mainly north-south communication—these agentless methods may miss internal APIs. While our eBPF sensor addresses this limitation, we recognize that installing agents requires significant resources and cross-departmental approval. Our one-click plugins for Gateways, Load Balancers, CDNs, and now WAFs give your teams immediate API visibility without upfront costs. Are all the API Security use cases limited to production? No, all of our use cases are capable of and meant to be deployed throughout the Software Development Lifecycle. 90% of critical security decisions happen before code reaches pre-production. By stepping in early, we enable the rectification of wrong decisions and support in making the right decisions. This ensures that exploit-proof applications are deployed instead of chasing false alerts in production. Is traffic instrumentation necessary? How is the traffic processed to avoid security risks and resource overruns? Our ability to discover, document, and test APIs primarily depends on access to their traffic. While code instrumentation is possible, the most crucial API parameters and API behavior are only visible in traffic. We begin by deploying our passive, out-of-band eBPF sensors (1 of our 12 instrumentation methods ) across environments to observe and collect API traffic, including SSL traffic. Instead of collecting everything (which could quickly amount to terabytes of data per day in high-performance environments), our agent smartly samples only what's necessary to create a conclusive and representative traffic profile. Thus, excessive data collection, processing, and duplication—common issues with traffic mirroring that drive up cloud costs—are avoided. Once collected, the sampled data is sent to our satellite for processing—a stark contrast to most vendors who process 100% of your data in their SaaS. After processing the traces, the satellite discards all of them, including those containing PII. You can choose to host the satellite yourself or have us host it. Either option maintains total capacity and can be deployed across all environments with a single click. Built using microservices, our stateless satellite supports Kubernetes , VMs, and serverless architecture and doesn’t require any updates to your Firewall configurations. column4: Narada AI, developed by AI experts from UC Berkeley, is transforming enterprise operations with Agentic Process Automation. Unlike traditional AI assistants, Narada's Large Action Models (LAMs) go beyond content generation to actually planning, orchestrating, and executing complex business processes across different enterprise applications. Seamlessly operating across some of the most common enterprise tools like ServiceNow, SAP Concur, Salesforce.com, and collaboration tools like Slack and Outlook, Narada automates tedious workflows such as processing invoices, updating records, managing approvals, and even testing —all without scripting or configuration. Narada converts natural-language instructions into task execution, operating tools through a combination of API function calls and browser-based UI automation. With on-prem deployment options for data privacy and security, Narada AI is the future of enterprise automation—helping IT, finance, and operations teams bring automation into the dark corners of the enterprise. AI-powered enterprise workflow automation—ready out of the box.
column6: Narada AI | Enterprise Agentic Process Automation & Orchestration | AI-Powered Enterprise Automation | Enterprise AI Automation | Enterprise AI Workflows | Enterprise AI Assistants | Beyond RPA: Next-Gen AI Automation | AI-Powered RPA | AI Orchestration for RPA | AI-driven Robotic Process Automation Agentic Process Automation For Enterprise Tools Moving beyond rule-based RPA, Narada uses Large Action Models developed by AI researchers from UC Berkeley and Stanford to automate complex workflows across different ecosystems. Request a demo We partner with We partner with Front Line Automation Automating tasks at the front lines of the enterprise Automate follow ups after every meeting and email conversation. Quickly turn receipts and emails into expense reports. Seamlessly convert conversations into CRM and ticketing system updates. Presenting Narada AI for Enterprise Professionals No scripting or configuration (or engineering degree) required Back Office Automation Automating workflows in the dark corners of the enterprise Automate web based front-end testing and validation. Automate IT processes that include manually operating online portals. Automate tasks in finance and HR that span multiple siloed tools. Agentic AI that meets enterprise standards for reliability, robustness, and safety Seamless integration across diverse tools and ecosystems Automate browser-based web portal actions Self-healing automation resilient to interface changes On-prem options for data privacy Security Certifications We don't train AI models on customer data. Narada adheres to global privacy laws and security standards with measures in place to help you meet your compliance obligations. SOC 2 (Type 1) Demonstrates that an organization has controls in place to safeguard data and ensure privacy. GDPR Compliance with data protection regulations within the European Union to protect individual privacy rights. CASA Tier 2 Ensures adherence to stringent security measures and standards for data protection and availability. CCPA Compliance with California Consumer Privacy Act, ensuring transparency and control over personal data for consumers. HIPAA Ensures compliance with the Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (option available in Enterprise Plan) What makes Narada different Leaders in AI Narada’s technology is rooted in breakthrough research from the UC Berkeley AI Research Lab, led by Prof. Kurt Keutzer. Our founders are leading AI researchers and serial entrepreneurs with deep enterprise backgrounds, who previously built successful companies that were acquired by Tesla and Synopsys. Our investors include the co-founders of Databricks, Perplexity, Cloudera, MosaicML, Coverity, Babblelabs, Cruise, OmniML, and esteemed faculty from Berkeley, MIT, Stanford, Columbia, and the University of Washington. Watch TC Talk Leadership The wall of love Hear it from our customers “ Narada turns painful tasks into single clicks. “ Top 3 Sales Intelligence Company “ Narada can automatically operate complex SaaS tools with customizable, changing interfaces. “ Top 5 AI Automation Company “ Our employees no longer waste a lot of time on admin tasks including expense reports. “ Fortune500 Systems Integrator Company Start using Narada Pricing Billed monthly Free Trial Everything you need to get started $ 0 per month Start using Narada 100 Narada Actions 5 Mins Advanced Voice Narada Enterprise Get a custom plat that fits your needs Custom Contact Us Build with Narada Custom Narada Actions Custom Hour Advanced Voice Priority Support API Access Custom Tool Support On-Prem Deployment We use cookies to help the website function and optionally to enhance your browsing experience. column4: Velos is an automation platform that helps non-technical teams automate repetitive, messy manual processes that have traditionally been outsourced to BPOs, Virtual Assistants or interns. Companies like Allied Insurance, AI Insurance, and Kamylon are saving hundreds of hours on mission-critical work they once thought would always be manual. From processing thousands of PDFs and spreadsheets in minutes for due diligence, to automating commission reconciliation across dozens of carrier portals—Velos empowers teams to automate manual work without the need for an army of engineers.
column6: Velos: AI Automation For Your Back Office Automate your company’s boring, but critical back-office work. Book a Demo MUNICIPAL RESOURCES, INC. Automating manual work is hard Over the last 10 years 15% of my staff has retired and i’m can’t fill these roles. The younger generation doesn’t want to do as much tedious, manual work. I have a team of 5 analysts but things are just taking way too long. Things need to move faster... My 1990 legacy payroll system can’t interface with my 2004 payroll provider so I have to transfer the data manually. I wish I could hire 10 more employees but I can’t find people willing to do the work. I know its not “fun” work and it’s highly repetitive but it’s mission critical to the business. I’m worried about introducing automation to my business because of the resistance that some employees may have. They worry that their job could be in jeopardy. I run a small healthcare clinic and we are really excited about using automation to migrate customer data from legacy systems. However, we don’t have a tech team. Is this a show-stopper for us? Velos is an easy-to-use automation platform for non-technical teams Automate work you never thought possible without hiring engineers or scaling headcount. " We've built a range of tools using Velos, from relatively simple automations to highly complex data extraction and evaluation tools. The time saved has been remarkable - ranging from hours on smaller tasks to several days on more involved projects. Tom Lavin, Managing Principal Kamylon | Private Equity How to train your AI Workforce 1 Connect your data - wherever it lives. Sync documents from your email, drive storage, or other 3rd party system via API or manual upload. 2 Create custom rules and tasks. Set up custom rules for each workflow in a single, extensible platform. Specify what data you want the assistant to look for, clean, or analyze. 3 Validate the output and fix any errors. Once your data is processed, any corrections or feedback you give are automatically used to improve the quality of the automation over time. 4 Push data to third -parties. We integrate with the software you already use (the new and the old) because we know your work doesn’t end with us. Build automations that connect to the software you already use even your dinosaur software Frequently Asked Questions I've seen some promising results using ChatGPT. Can this do anything like that? Will you be able to help me with my specific task? I didn't see an example of it. What type of data sources do you accept? We're already using a BPO, can we still use this? I'm a BPO firm, can we use this? You wouldn’t be here if the way you’ve been working was working. Book a Demo Product Login Blog Book a Demo © GradientJ Inc. 2025. column6: inBuild | Construction Financials Made Easy We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, collect interaction data, and analyze site traffic. Check our Privacy Policy for details. Project Managers and Financial Controllers at Leading Builders Use inBuild Click for Case Study Click for Case Study Hey, we're inBuild. Who are you? Owner You need accurate financials. Accuracy and cost savings are key. Never miss an invoice, pay application, change order, contract, lien, or payment again. Project Manager You want to code from anywhere. No need to spend more time at the office. Submit, review, and manage project financials from the field (or the King Ranch). Financial Controller You love an organized process. Centralize your process. Documents are automatically processed, so you can focus on the bigger picture. Accountant You rely on other platforms. Connect with your other financial platforms. Sync processed documents with a single click. No more translating from cost code to account. Simplify Your Entire Process Invoicing Workflows Integrations Automatic Document Processing Documents are automatically uploaded and processed from your email. Sit back and relax while we take down the key details for you. Job Cost Tracking A schedule of values that updates for you, giving the most accurate and up-to-date financial status for your projects. Pay Application Creation Export pay applications with a single click. Completely customizable, so you can give your clients what they need. Review and Approval Send documents to other users for review and approval. PMs need only be concerned with documents relevant to their projects. Electronic Filing Cabinet Easily search and retrieve past invoices anytime, making it easy to stay organized and audit-proof your business operations. Contracts, Change Orders, Liens Create and manage the most common documents. Generate based on invoice data and send for signature using our integrations . Financial Platforms Sync with your software of choice using our integrations . Reconcile billing the way you always have, while skipping the data entry. Document Management Connect with other platforms to manage and track documents. Increase your redundancy and have control over your data. Mobile App Use the mobile app to snap a picture of any document. Upload from anywhere and it will be processed when you're back in the office. Support so Good, It'll Blow Your Mind Experts in the USA Don't get stuck on another call with support thousands of miles away. Our experts are based in the United States and have industry experience . Effective communication and quick resolution are our specialty. Lightning-Fast No more waiting on hold. Our team responds within 5 minutes . Need specialized training or more intensive support? We offer same-day video conferencing to solve even the most complex issues. Unmatched Knowledge No matter the question, our team will get you the most accurate and helpful information. From product support to recommendations on best practices, we have a wealth of information you can lean onto improve your process. Recommendations come with effort and cost estimates to maximize return on tuning efforts. Anomaly Detection Get alerted when conditions deviate from expectations and never be surprised by your cloud bill again. Built-in resource policies create guardrails for Data Engineering and Analyst teams so they can spend less time on efficiency management and more on value-added activities. Continuous Governance With features like real-time data monitoring, Bluesky delivers continuous awareness to remediate crucial performance issues like sudden usage spikes, runaway queries, and data pipeline failures. Customers can also opt-in to Bluesky’s automated optimizations for continuous efficiency. Cost Attribution Track cost and usage across the entire enterprise through comprehensive cost analysis. Bluesky decomposes costs from the full bill down to individual queries, tables and even reclustering. Units of cost can then be re-aggregated by users, departments and applications to give a business understanding of ROI and cost of cloud resources. Efficiency Management Beyond Cost Savings Cost savings is only the beginning of your journey with us. We believe data efficiency touches every part of the data lifecycle, from the data engineer or analyst, to operational reporting and applications, to FinOps management. Cost Optimization Proper optimization of your Data Cloud environment is the only viable way to manage cost as you scale. Bluesky empowers complete optimization capabilities by identifying inefficient workloads and providing actionable recommendations and automated changes to eliminate waste. Query Writer Efficiency Bluesky can identify poor query patterns, provide recommendations for improving code quality and efficiency, and train SQL query writers to produce better code. This empowers data platform teams to not just support analysts, but focus on enabling them. Data Cloud Performance Bluesky identifies long-running pipelines that are at risk of violating SLAs and provides actionable insights to improve the performance of your data tools in both data pipelines and BI or analytics workloads. This enables you to run operational reporting and applications efficiently. Hear From Our Customers “Bluesky not only helps us get significantly more value out of Snowflake but also allows our engineering team to stay focused on business-critical projects.” Our team doesn’t have the bandwidth to dedicate resources to cost and efficiency initiatives. Instead, we rely on Bluesky to optimize our workloads and provide continuous workload governance. Bluesky’s Snowflake Copilot product leads to an even better Snowflake user experience. XZ Tie Data Platform Eng Lead “Within hours of connecting Bluesky to our Snowflake deployment one of its recommendations reduced our compute expenses by more than 30%” Bluesky has quickly become a trusted partner, always going above and beyond. We’re really looking forward to trying out the more advanced automation that Bluesky has planned. Ross Serven Data-Driven Technical Leader “We’re able to simultaneously reduce waste while improving the value we get from our data” Bluesky’s continuous cost governance capabilities and actionable insights have helped us to cut costs and improve the performance of query workloads without any reduction in functionality. Michael Li VP of Data “The tool gave us deep visibility into our Snowflake expenses in terms of query costs and warehouse credit usage” Their feedback and insights identified immediate actions we can take to reduce our compute costs. The team at Bluesky is genuinely devoted towards aiding us in our optimization efforts, and has been straight forward and easy to work with throughout the process. Chris Okorodudu Tech Lead, Data Infrastructure “Valuable for SaaS products built on top of Snowflake” Bluesky is able to break down our Snowflake spend based on our customers' workloads. This is extremely valuable for SaaS products built on top of Snowflake. Bryan Shupe CEO and Founder “We are excited to continue developing our partnership with the Bluesky team and further tune our data cloud” In the first few days of using Bluesky, we were able to identify a number of non-trivial ways of optimizing our Snowflake usage. Marion Pavillet Senior Analytics Engineer “Bluesky Mission Control required less than 10 minutes of onboarding time, and provided visibility into our Snowflake usage and cost” Bluesky identified areas of cost reduction and workload optimization. We plan to continuously use the SaaS product to monitor and keep our Snowflake workloads’ cost efficiency high. Hallie Million Head of Data “Now we can concentrate on building the future of SaaS apps and let Bluesky take care of what they’re best at.” Adding Bluesky to our stack immediately improved our ability to see what was going on with costs and performance. Bluesky gives us insights that are easy to understand—like a priority ranked list of profiled queries with total hits and estimated credits—and clear actions we can take to tune queries or remove redundant workloads. Shubhankar Srivastava Co-Founder “If the Snowflake bill is keeping you awake at night, consider Bluesky!” Snowflake is one of the main drivers in our COGS. Before Bluesky, we struggled to allocate time and effort to analyze and optimize the usage systematically. Bluesky solves this pain-point by introducing a complete feedback loop. It is effortless to get a report at the cost breakdown for different workloads, query patterns, and warehouses. The optimizations are data-driven, spot-on and straightforward to implement. The cost savings can be easily validated in the reports. Feng Shao VP Engineering “An easy and collaborative production trial and adoption” Bluesky was able to help identify and optimize costly queries, thus reducing our costs meaningfully. Justin Zhang Sr. Director of Engineering The Teams We Empower Bluesky not only helps us get significantly more value out of Snowflake but also allows our engineering team to stay focused on business-critical projects. column4: Fiber helps developers build SaaS integrations faster. We sync data from APIs into databases, where it can be used to power features.
column6: Fiber: ETL for developers New! Open-sourcing Handshake : easy OAuth for over 200 APIs. postgres-prod stripe_refunds salesforce_orders plaid_balances quickbooks_balances Powering integrations for fast-scaling startups What is Fiber Consume data from third-party APIs directly from your database or cloud storage Fiber syncs data from your users' accounts in third-party tools into your database or cloud storage. We take care of scaling and securing this sync so you can focus on building a great product. How it works 1. Select API resources Choose which resource types you want Fiber to continuously pull from the API you want to integrate. 2. Connect database or bucket Enter destination credentials that Fiber can use to mount tables or folders, and modify their data. 3. Register user credentials Send your users' third-party credentials to Fiber via the API or dashboard. Syncing will begin immediately.

column4: The rise of cloud-based infrastructure and services over the past decade has fundamentally changed how modern applications are built and deployed. Gone are the days of self-contained monolithic architectures, where every dependency was within your corporate network. Today, developers rely on a wide range of external APIs and services to deliver essential features and accelerate business outcomes. This shift to a highly connected and dynamic architecture has brought new challenges for operators, such as unpredictable outages, security risks, and complex troubleshooting. Led by a team of seasoned entrepreneurs and tech leaders with experience scaling solutions at companies like Shopify, Instacart, DigitalOcean, Hashicorp and NS1, Qpoint was built to address these evolving challenges. Our platform provides the visibility and control needed to help operators manage their mission-critical apps' external dependencies and traffic to ensure reliable and secure operations.
column6: Cloud Egress : Your Biggest Blindspot | Qpoint Watch: Cut through encryption to observe an AI agent with zero instrumentation ⏵ Your Biggest Blind Spot, Our Only Focus Cloud Runtime & Egress Security See through encryption to map dependencies, identify sensitive data sharing, and enforce egress controls Request a Demo Trusted in Prod by: Simple Installation, Zero Instrumentation -> Full Visibility Linux Docker Kubernetes Serverless $ curl -s https://get.qpoint.io/install | sudo sh The modern cloud is complex and encrypted–making it impossible to see what's actually happening In cloud environments, an encrypted session to anywhere on the internet happens in microseconds– all the payload data disappears into the session before any security control can inspect it –exposing unacceptable / critical risks - Data Exfiltration - Compliance gaps - Shadow APIs - Command and Control (C2) - AI/Asset Theft What's not working Proxies Single point of failure Added latency Significant operation burden Custom MITM certs are risky Custom Instrumentation Malicious actors can hide Requires significant dev effort Can't see what's not instrumented High storage costs to scan data Blissful Ignorance Can't see what's in place Modern environments are changing daily AI agents can be non-deterministic Vulnerabilities can hide without detection The Qpoint Solution Zero-Instrumentation Don't get owned by egress Expose shadow APIs, identify all data exfiltration, catch command-and-control, and enforce safe egress controls AI Agent observability Take a huge step forward to trust AI within your infrastructure, seeing exactly what's running and what it's doing Identify all data sharing Identify all PII/PCI/PHI or other sensitive data, where it's going and who's responsible for the app sending it Dependency mapping and inventory Map all dependencies and external connections, with full attribution to show what's connecting and which teams own them Q. Tap See Through Encryption A lightweight eBPF agent that provides deep visibility into application traffic through kernel and library integration. It captures both connection metadata and payload content before encryption, giving you complete context for every service interaction. Learn More View on Github Q. Plane Map Your Dependencies Qplane provides a unified interface for managing Qtap agents and Qcontrol policies across your organization. Monitor service health, track API usage, and gain actionable insights from comprehensive dashboards. Full Inventory Vendors Endpoints Clients / Services API Tokens Geo-Location Real-Time Traffic Every Connection Requests / Responses Performance Reliability Bandwidth Wire & Payloads Full Payloads Errors & Anomalies Pre-Encrypted Data Full Attribution Q. Control Enforce Egress Controls Qcontrol allows you to define and enforce precise traffic policies based on rich pre-encryption context from Qtap. Protect sensitive services, prevent data exfiltration, and ensure compliance with security standards. Request a Demo Request a demo of the only eBPF-based solution that provides real-time visibility into your external dependencies and traffic flows to prevent outages, quickly diagnose issues, protect sensitive data, and reduce cloud spend without any code changes or data leaving your network. column4: Opstream.ai is an AI-powered procurement orchestration platform that streamlines procurement processes, empowers teams with self-service workflows, and eliminates inefficiencies to drive better business outcomes. Designed for organizations of all sizes, Opstream enables procurement and finance teams to optimize purchasing workflows, ensure compliance, and achieve cost savings without sacrificing speed or flexibility. With a user-friendly drag-and-drop editor, Opstream allows businesses to configure custom procurement workflows without the need for coding. Its intelligent AI engine prevents redundant purchases by identifying existing or similar tools within the organization, while robust vendor management features simplify onboarding and information gathering. Real-time collaboration tools enhance teamwork, enabling users to engage stakeholders and approvers seamlessly. Opstream integrates with hundreds of business tools, creating a unified system for managing procurement operations. The platform reduces request handling time by 47%, cuts implementation time by 90%, and delivers significant cost savings with a 23% reduction in expenses. Trusted by companies like LastPass and Guesty, Opstream helps organizations achieve 100% compliance, minimize shadow procurement, and focus on strategic initiatives. Whether you're looking to eliminate inefficiencies, improve approval workflows, or gain better control over vendor management, Opstream is the all-in-one platform for modernizing and optimizing procurement processes.

Strictly Necessary Cookies Strictly Necessary Cookie should be enabled at all times so that we can save your preferences for cookie settings. Enable or Disable Cookies Enabled Disabled If you disable this cookie, we will not be able to save your preferences. This means that every time you visit this website you will need to enable or disable cookies again.

column4: Populate's mission is to end burnout caused by legacy clinical software systems that inundate clinicians with extra documentation, time-consuming user experience, and poor interoperability. Our next-gen system leverages fully native speech-to-text, NLP, and auto-populate functions within specialty-specific templates and streamlined workflows that fit the way practitioners do their job. We aim to maximize time savings relative to status quo EMRs. And by dramatically cutting down the time required for documentation, we help clinicians spend more time engaging with patients, improving care, and maximizing practice profitability. In building the next generation EMR system, we are solving exciting problems in the fields of Engineering, Human-Computer-Interaction, and device integration. Our tech stack includes C#, F#, ASP.NET Core, SQL Server, Microsoft Cognitive Services, Azure, React, and Typescript. Our ultra-collaborative learning culture provides personal growth opportunities that would not be available at larger organizations. If you are ready to accelerate your career and impact change, we will invest in your rapid development.

column4: Supply chain planning is broken. Data is trapped across SAP, Blue Yonder, o9, and hundreds of chaotic spreadsheets. The result? A staggering $1.77T in global waste annually and constant firefighting. Bucephalus transforms reactive planning into proactive optimization. Our semantic data layer unifies your existing systems into a single source of truth, powering an intelligent decision engine that can either enhance your current platforms or fully replace them. Think of it as a "headless" planning system - all the intelligence, none of the legacy constraints. Recently implemented Blue Yonder, o9, or Kinaxis but not seeing results? We can help. Our platform works alongside these systems to deliver the value you were promised, without starting over.
