column4: A Sales team typically uses 5-6 document tools: 1. Document generation tool for creating personalized proposal/contracts etc. using a template & customer data. Ex: Conga composer, Panda Docs, Quip. 2. Document Storage tool for storing files in a cloud storage. Ex: SharePoint, Google Drive, Salesforce. 3. Document Discovery tool for finding the right content in the business context. Ex: Seismic, Highspot. 4. Document Sharing tool for sharing documents with customers & tracking engagement. Ex: Showpad, DocSend. 5. E-signatures tool to Esign on documents. Ex: DocuSign, HelloSign Problems with current document stack is that: 1. These tools don’t talk to each other. 2. They add a lot of friction to the sales process. 3. Sales people have to keep jumping between these tools. 4. Sensitive files & customer data is scattered across these platforms. 5. They don’t integrate well with the existing processes. Enter CloudFiles which is a full stack document automation & sharing platform. It is: a) Friction Eliminator: 1. Exposed through the CRMs - acts as CRM extension & not as a new tool 2. Mirrors existing storage - Works on top of SharePoint, Google Drive etc. Customer’s sensitive files remain with them. b) Deeply Integrated: 1. CRMs are very powerful at automations, it’s their core business. 2. CloudFiles deeply integrates with these tools, harnessing the full power of CRMs. c) Full Stack: 1. CloudFiles would support all functions across document lifecycle, with an option to plug user’s own tool as well. 2. Ex: Someone wants to use DocuSign instead of our e-signatures, they can, in a seamless way. d) Highly Customizable: 1. All sales processes are unique. Salesforce understood that and pioneered CRMs. 2. CloudFiles takes the same approach, building on top of CRMs, enabling customers to fully customize their processes involving documents. All in a no code way.

column4: Paladin Cloud is a rapidly growing, open source, cloud security company with a Security-as-Code platform that helps developers and security teams significantly reduce risks in cloud environments to protect their applications and data. The company’s holistic approach to cloud security is based on its policy management plane that leverages best practice security policies in an open, connector-based architecture. Paladin Cloud supports developers in their cloud native journey by helping them identify blind spots in their cloud environments to protect their applications and data. The single pane of glass, policy management plane provides visibility into your cloud assets through real-time, continuous monitoring to quickly identify and remediate security risks. For security teams, Paladin Cloud’s powerful visualization and compliance reporting provides actionable intelligence and context to help prioritize the events that matter.

column4: Founded in 2021 and based in San Francisco, Monomer Bio specializes in wet-lab productivity and automation software built for cell biology workflows. We aim to transform the landscape of scientific research by automating laboratory processes while capturing clean, well-structured data. We have delivered a number of automated cell culture solutions to customers working in the fields of drug discovery and cell and gene therapy. We also consult: whether you need help deciding what instruments to buy, need help getting your instruments and software to talk to each other, or need something custom-built (software or hardware), drop us a note at hello@monomerbio.com. We love deep dives with your biologists, engineers, technicians, or executive team.
column6: Monomer Bio A new paradigm for cell biology Develop and optimize high-quality disease models with Monomer Cell culture, meet infrastructure Make discoveries at an unprecedented speed and scale Monomer integrates your lab with advanced workflow automation, monitoring, and data analysis tools to help you make faster decisions that lead to more breakthroughs. The Monomer Stack Biology Cells are our foundation We help you maintain cells at scale so you can focus on designing and running mission-critical experiments. Automation Your lab, unlocked Our software connects to standard lab instruments so you can create automated protocols that multiply throughput. Data Well history at your fingertips We continuously monitor cell cultures, keep track of changes, and make past data easy for you to find and use later. Insights Organize and prioritize Our real-time feed of analyzed culture data simplifies cell maintenance so you can make impactful decisions faster. A software platform that speaks for your cells Maintain, select, and engineer your cells with just a click. Monomer integrates common lab instruments into fully automated workcells with our cohesive suite of workflow automation, data analysis, and decision-making tools. Monitor Our integrated system tracks changes in plates via images to give you real-time insight into hundreds of live samples at once. Record Generate, organize, and share cell line and culture data directly from your lab instruments. Interpret Plot metrics of interest to identify trends and structure imaging data for deep learning applications. Act Take action and update protocols in response to changing growth conditions or experimental readouts. Applications Cell Culture Develop protocols for adherent, suspension, and 3D culture workflows by optimizing media composition and feeding schedules. Stem Cell Differentiation Consistently develop organoids with 2D or 3D culture models by growing dozens of stem cell and tissue types in parallel and at scale. Cell Engineering Streamline the generation of novel cell lines with tools that track critical characteristics, like transfection, efficiency, and monoclonality. Designed for cell biology, by cell biologists Our biology, robotics, and engineering experts built Monomer to help you make more breakthroughs. We guide our clients through automating their lab, from consultation to culturing. Then, we help them analyze data and design new ways to enable more discovery. Learn More Trusted By Ready to reign in the complexity of cells? Get Started 51 Outlook Cir, Pacifica, CA 94044 About Us What's New Get Started Safety and Security hello@monomerbio.com Copyright © 2024 Monomer Bio, Inc. All Rights Reserved Terms and Conditions Privacy Policy

column4: Qleet is a next generation software delivery platform that automates the provisioning and scaling of compute infrastructure, configuration of runtime environments and continuous delivery of applications.
column6: Qleet Home Fully Managed Threeport Try It Out The Platform to Replace Your Pipelines Use Threeport without managing the control plane Threeport is redefining software delivery in cloud native environments. Qleet allows you to use Threeport without the overhead of deploying, maintaining, upgrading or troubleshooting the Threeport control plane. Qleet includes Role Based Access Control Qleet provides Role Based Access Control for your Threeport control plane so your entire team can use Threeport with the right privileges. Managed by the creators of Threeport Qleet's engineering team are the creators and maintainers of open source Threeport. We'll support you every step of the way. Better Software | Lower Costs Expert Support Qleet's engineering team will be with you every step of the way to unlock the capabilities of Threeport. We designed and built the entire system. We've got your back. Custom Functionality Need custom extensions to Threeport? Qleet users can use our customization services to extend Threeport to provide custom abstactions for your high value workloads to optimize your developer's productivity. Self Hosting as a Service Qleet runs and manages your Threeport control plane to orchestrate your software delivery. But your Kubernetes clusters, managed services and workloads run on your cloud provider account. Enterprise Edition (Coming Soon) Qleet Enterprise Edition is a fully supported installation of the Qleet service on your cloud provider account. Qleet provides professional services for installation, integration and customization. Qleet Enterprise Edition allows your platform engineering team to build Threeport extensions using the Threeport SDK. Software Delivery Redefined Qleet's fully managed Threeport control planes give you the power of Kubernetes without the complexity and up-front costs. You get a worry-free unified control plane to manage all your cloud provider infrastructure, your Kubernetes clusters, your cloud provider managed services, and the support services on Kubernetes. Eliminate toil. Maximize innovation. Get Started ©2024 Qleet.io . All Rights Reserved

column4: Clyr helps companies streamline their expense management process. With our user-friendly platform, companies can easily track expenses made by in-field teams, enforce policies, and get real-time visibility into their spending. Say goodbye to manual processes and hello to streamlined expense management with Clyr.

column4: Cedara is transforming the media industry by accelerating sustainability at every level. With a comprehensive suite of enterprise-grade measurement and optimization solutions, Cedara empowers media companies to drive superior performance while minimizing environmental impact across both operations and advertising campaigns. Its high-impact platform enables clients to seamlessly maximize ROI through energy-efficient, data-driven strategies that align business growth with sustainability goals. Founded in 2021, Cedara is headquartered in New York City, with offices in the US, UK, France, Germany, and Australia. Learn more at cedara.io.
column6: Cedara | The AI Engine for Sustainable Media | Visit us! An increasing number of brands are setting net zero targets while also facing regulatory requirements such as the EU’s CSRD. Effectively measuring the impact of your media and optimizing to be more efficient will be critical in attracting brands and winning investments. column4: We are a B2B data company looking to make the carbon credit space more functional for all stakeholders. Picture Pitchbook.com for carbon markets. Additionally, project developers will have expanded access to financing. It's a transformational win-win for all players. column4: Cloud cost optimization is critical, yet 90% of customers feel they are overspending on AWS due to increasing cloud complexity. Managing cloud infrastructure effectively across multiple internal stakeholders is challenging in terms of scalability, reliability, security, unit economics, and total cost of ownership. zOpt.ai leverages its deep AWS heritage and founding team's expertise to offer a solution to this problem. Our platform provides comprehensive coverage, deep insights, and automation to eliminate wasted spend, all tracked by our unique zScore— similar to a FICO rating—ensuring continuous optimization over time. zOpt.ai's automated cloud optimization platform, offered as Software as a Service (SaaS), analyzes your cloud infrastructure over the past 12 months, identifying optimization opportunities. Our AI models suggest both manual (high-touch) and automated (Zero-touch) implementation options. Progress is monitored using the zScore, a metric combining speed, cost, and cloud debt. Customers typically save 3x-10x more on cloud costs compared to the cost of a zOpt.ai subscription within 3-6 months. Current customers report an average of 20% cost savings, 30% performance improvement, and a 15% increase in zScore. Our Human-vetted automation, uniquely combines the speed and accuracy of automation with human knowledge and oversight. We invite you to start saving on cloud costs and enhancing your infrastructure's performance with just a few clicks. Our process is designed to be fast and lightweight, with onboarding and initial assessment completed within 24 hours.

column4: Geode IP is a seed round venture backed startup fanatically focused on making it easier for companies to manage and protect their intellectual property. IP is a wildly valuable asset. In fact, did you know that America's intellectual property is worth $6.6 Trillion? Yet despite the overwhelming importance of a company’s patents, trademarks and copyrights, legal teams are often forced to manage their IP portfolio with clunky legacy software or even a cobbled together manual solution such as an excel spreadsheet. As a result, businesses are significantly less efficient and at risk of making basic errors that could result in a loss of a major competitive advantage. That’s where Geode IP comes in. We are building a modern cloud based software solution that solves for the entire IP lifecycle, from the spark of an innovative idea, all the way through to analysis and ongoing portfolio management. Intellectual property management is too important to be left to legacy software and spreadsheets. We believe there is a better way and we hope you join us in this mission.

But as the industry evolves, so do the needs of contractors. That’s why Ascent is expanding its capabilities to support roofing, HVAC, battery storage, and broader home renovation services and commercial construction projects, enabling Ascent’s users to diversify their revenue streams while maintaining operational efficiency. Whether adding new service lines or integrating existing ones, Ascent provides the visibility, automation, and financial controls needed to scale. 01 One project record, shared with every stakeholder Our platform lets employees, contractors, and partner networks work together off the same project record while still using the tools they prefer. 02 Coordinate in Real-time Use activity assignments and project-specific notes with messaging features to simplify coordination and communication across distributed teams. 03 Grow with Margin Lock in margins at the onset—and maintain them through the unexpected—by ensuring buildable projects, validating pricing, and leveraging built-in change management. 04 Maximize Productivity Optimize resources to minimize project duration and cost with built-in features like WIP filters, process SLAs, crew scheduling, and AHJ repository. Explore the Platform → Supporting commercial construction firms with subcontractor management Beyond residential projects, Ascent OS is now collaborating with commercial construction firms to improve project visibility, manage subcontractor workflows, and optimize capital allocation. With real-time project tracking and financial oversight, developers and general contractors can ensure task based capital disbursements, reducing risk and improving project profitability. column4: Peony is a productivity platform on a mission to solve two major issues that affect team productivity — the missing context with file sharing/collaboration; and the constant juggling between several applications and tools to carry out daily tasks. Our platform allows teams to collaborate with rich context and removes the noise introduced from having things scattered across Slack, Jira, emails, notebooks and the list goes on. Peony also provides a seamless environment for users to use any web or native applications (Microsoft Office Tools, Figma, PhotoShop, Github etc.) without worrying about opening too many tabs or downloading/uploading files. It’s what the world has been waiting for — a productivity platform that makes work fast and collaboration easy.
column6: Peony: Next Generation File Sharing AI powered file sharing File sharing for modern teams Peony is the #1 DocSend and WeTransfer alternative to share files. It lets you create personalized file sharing sites for your recipients, and makes it incredibly easy to stay organized and track your shares. It's the last file sharing app you'll ever need. It's a game-changer for startups aiming to scale efficiently. Charles Andrade CFO | Mid-Market With Apokto, we've unlocked new levels of operational efficiency. It's not just about saving costs; it's about empowering our entire team with instant actionable insights for smarter decision-making. Mary Barajas VP of Finance | $74M Revenue Integrating Apokto was a strategic move that paid off beyond expectations. We've seen a 5% increase in operational efficiency and significantly reduced our dependency on external consultants for financial analysis. Security We take security very seriously Our goal is to build trust by focusing on a strong security posture with our clients data and the emerging AI space. Trust & Safety FAQ's Frequently Asked Questions What is Apokto Apokto is a generative AI finance platform for CFOs and financial teams, leveraging advanced knowledge graph technology for deeper insights beyond traditional Gen AI approaches. This foundation creates the basis for a plethora of features ranging from smart alerts, chat, smart data rooms, and much more. How does Apokto tailor insights to our specific business needs? Apokto’s unique combination of language models and knowledge graphs is fine-tuned with your specific data and operational context in mind. This approach allows us to deliver highly relevant insights, predictive analytics, and decision support that’s directly applicable to your unique business challenges and opportunities. How does Apokto ensure the security and protection of our data? Apokto prioritizes data security through advanced encryption, role-based access control (RBAC), and continuous security audits, including penetration testing and a dedicated Trust and Safety team. Our platform also offers data residency options to meet regulatory needs, supported by 24/7 monitoring and a rapid incident response framework, ensuring your financial data is secure and protected at all times. What integrations does Apokto have? Commerce: Amazon Seller Central BigCommerce Magento 1 Magento 2 Shopify Walmart WooCommerce Wix Accounting: FreshBooks Intuit QuickBooks Desktop Intuit QuickBooks Online Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central NetSuite Oracle ERP Cloud Sage 50cloud Accounting Sage 100 Sage 300 Sage Intacct Xero Payment: Adyen Braintree Checkout.com Payoneer PayPal Plaid Square Stripe Marketplace: Faire Mercado Libre Wayfair Point of Sale: Clover Lightspeed Retail Square Toast ERP: Acumatica Epicor Odoo SAP Business One Does Apokto just make OpenAI Calls? Currently Apokto uses several closed and open source LLMs, including GPT-4. We’re currently taking a unique approach that involves building an in-house suite of Small Language Models (SLMs) that are fine-tuned for the complexities and nuances of finance. This bespoke methodology offers several benefits: Data Security : By not depending on third-party APIs like OpenAI, Apokto ensures that sensitive financial data remains within the control of the client’s environment, mitigating potential security risks associated with external data processing. Customization : Apokto’s models are specifically tailored to the tasks and data of the finance sector, leading to higher accuracy and relevance in outputs such as financial forecasting, risk assessment, and reporting. Performance : The SLMs are optimized for the specific computational and data needs of financial operations, leading to faster processing times and more efficient data handling compared to generalized models. Cost Efficiency : Avoiding external API calls can reduce operational costs, as it eliminates the fees associated with these services and the need for excessive data transfer bandwidth. Continuous Improvement : Since the models are proprietary, Apokto has the agility to rapidly iterate and improve upon them based on user feedback and emerging financial trends. Regulatory Compliance : Having complete ownership of the AI technology allows for better alignment with financial regulations and compliance standards, which is a critical concern for financial institutions.

column4: CloseCore helps accounting teams produce more accurate financial data faster. The platform gives accountants one place to manage the entire month-end close process, from checklist and reconciliations to reporting and compliance, and uses AI to automate and validate parts of the close. It is accessible to teams of all sizes and only takes a day to implement. CloseCore is trusted by top companies across all industries, technology environments and ERP systems to deliver a fast, modern and accessible close management solution.

column4: Our vision is to revolutionize the end-to-end procurement journey for businesses, especially for SMBs (Small and Medium Businesses) globally. column4: Milio's platform simplifies B2B payments and interactions, automates recurring collections and payouts, and offers cash management solutions to SMEs and mid-market enterprises through efficient workflows and seamless bank-to-bank domestic and cross-border payments.
column6: Ahora mueve dinero al instante tarjeta a tarjeta Milio redefine las transferencias en tiempo real a través de tarjetas. Nuestra plataforma permite la dispersión de fondos a terceros y la automatización de recaudos, tanto variables como recurrentes, disponibles 24/7 con los más altos estándares de seguridad, sin las restricciones de ACH. Empezar ahora Contamos con el respaldo de Soluciones de movimiento de dinero en una sola plataforma. Con la API de Milio, las empresas, instituciones financieras y gobiernos pueden conectarse al nuevo sistema de transferencias entre tarjetas para habilitar soluciones de envío y recepción de dinero, tanto a nivel local como internacional, en tiempo real. B2B2C PAYOUTS Dispersión de fondos Programa, automatiza y ejecuta desembolsos de fondos a proveedores, aliados y clientes con nuestra API y conexión directa a ERPs. Controla múltiples niveles de autorización y supervisa el fraude en cada transacción de manera eficiente. “Con Milio, todos los empleados reciben la nómina al tiempo” – Luis P2M ∙ B2B PAYINS Recaudo instantáneo Ofrece a tus clientes soluciones de recaudo con un clic y abono inmediato desde cualquier banco. Facilita cobros únicos, débitos automáticos y recurrentes directamente en tus plataformas. “El dinero llega al instante, sin esperar días.” – Mariana P2P Cash in y Cash Out Personaliza la experiencia y permite la tokenización de múltiples tarjetas en tu app bancaria o wallet, facilitando recargas y transferencias en tiempo real. Ofrece pagos para convenios, servicios públicos y suscripciones. “Milio es la alternativa a Transfiya y PSE” – Camila X BORDER PAYMENTS Transferencias internacionales Conecta a tus clientes con remesas globales de manera rápida, simple e instantánea. Integra nuestra solución en tus canales para facilitar el envío y recepción de transferencias a nivel mundial. “Recibe remesas desde EEUU en menos de un minuto, en la comodidad de tu tarjeta débito” – Gónzalo Integra una tecnología de clase mundial +10K Transacciones por segundo. 99.99% De estabilidad en la red. < 1 min. Disponibilización de fondos. 24/7​ Disponibilidad de conexión. Juan Luis Pérez Nuestro CEO “ ” Las plataformas que se integren a nosotros obtendrán un sistema robusto y altamente escalable, capaz de manejar miles de transacciones por segundo de manera eficiente y segura Soluciones a la medida para cada industria Bancos Aumenta el uso de tus canales transaccionales ofreciendo experiencias modernas de P2P, Cash In, Cash Out y recepción de remesas en tu app. Wallets Ofrece a tus usuarios recargas a un clic con disponibilización de fondos en tiempo real. Personaliza tus flujos P2P para convertir tu Wallet en una superapp. Fintech Dispersa fondos a terceros y debita los recaudos de tus clientes de forma automática, recurrente y variable. Corporaciones Realiza todas las operaciones desde un solo dashboard. Dispersa a terceros para pagar nómina y proveedores. Crea procesos de recaudo y concilia todas las operaciones en tiempo real. Diseñado para equipos de ingeniería Ahorra tiempo de desarrollo con nuestra solución de transferencias unificada. Simplificamos la complejidad del mundo de los pagos para que tus equipos construyan todo lo que necesitan desde una sola plataforma. column6: asynos.com | 522: Connection timed out Connection timed out Error code 522 Visit cloudflare.com for more information. 2024-10-03 01:15:55 UTC You Browser Working Chicago Cloudflare Working asynos.com Host Error What happened? The initial connection between Cloudflare's network and the origin web server timed out. As a result, the web page can not be displayed. What can I do? If you're a visitor of this website: Please try again in a few minutes. If you're the owner of this website: Contact your hosting provider letting them know your web server is not completing requests. An Error 522 means that the request was able to connect to your web server, but that the request didn't finish. The most likely cause is that something on your server is hogging resources. Additional troubleshooting information here. Cloudflare Ray ID: 8cc91487ca7a29bd • Your IP: 134.199.90.107 • Performance & security by Cloudflare

column6: Inventory365 – Online Inventory Management Software The right product, at the right time, everytime. Inventory365, the leading AI-powered platform for inventory management and growth, empowers modern product sellers to excel by seamlessly linking all sales channels and automating end-to-end order processing. Try for Free Schedule a demo Revolutionize your inventory management with AI-driven automation Leverage machine learning, connected processes, and heightened visibility across sales, operations, forecasting, supply, replenishment, and inventory functions to adapt to shifting demand. Multichannel Integration Inventory365 enables you to seamlessly link all your sales channels, including online marketplaces, and e-commerce sales channels, and manage them from a single dashboard. With this feature, you can easily track inventory levels and orders across different channels, and efficiently handle customer data. You can also automate sales processes like order routing and batching, which reduces manual errors and processing time. By automating your sales processes, you can reduce the risk of errors and delays, and ensure smooth order fulfillment for your customers. Order Management Inventory365’s order management feature helps you streamline your order fulfillment process with automated workflows and order tracking. By setting up automated order routing and batching, you can reduce manual errors and processing time. With Inventory365, you can also integrate with shipping carriers and print shipping labels directly from the platform, which simplifies the entire order fulfillment process. Automated workflows reduce the time and effort required for order processing, allowing you to focus on growing your business. Real-time Inventory visibility With Inventory365, you can get real-time visibility into your inventory levels across all sales channels and warehouses. This feature helps you avoid stockouts and overstocking by giving you real-time inventory insights. You can also set up automated alerts and notifications for low stock and stockouts, which ensures that you always have enough stock to fulfill orders. Additionally, Inventory365’s AI-powered forecasting feature helps you accurately forecast demand and optimize inventory levels, which further minimizes the risk of stockouts. Warehouse Management Inventory365’s warehouse management module helps you organize your warehouse operations with custom workflows and labeling. You can optimize picking, packing, and shipping with advanced algorithms and automation, which saves time and reduces the risk of errors. With Inventory365, you can also use mobile scanning devices for real-time inventory updates and improved accuracy. These features allow you to efficiently manage your warehouse operations and reduce operational costs. Reporting and Analytics Inventory365’s reporting and analytics enable you to create custom reports and dashboards to track KPIs and performance metrics. You can monitor inventory turnover, profit margins, and order accuracy, which helps you make informed decisions about your business. Additionally, you can analyze sales trends and customer behavior to improve forecasting and demand planning. With Inventory365’s reporting and analytics, you can gain valuable insights into your business and optimize your operations for maximum efficiency. Multi-Price/Multi-Currency Inventory365 offers a multi-price/multi-currency feature that enables you to sell your products in different currencies and at different prices across multiple sales channels. With this feature, you can create different price lists for different customers or sales channels, and set prices in different currencies. This feature allows you to sell your products globally and target customers in different regions with localized pricing. This helps you efficiently manage your pricing and optimize your sales across multiple markets. Price Comparison Inventory365 offers a price comparison feature that allows you to compare your product prices with those of your competitors across different sales channels. With this feature, you can monitor your competitors’ prices and adjust your prices accordingly to stay competitive. You can also set up automated price alerts and notifications, which notify you of any changes in your competitors’ prices. Inventory365’s price comparison feature enables you to make informed pricing decisions and optimize your product pricing for maximum profitability. This feature helps you stay competitive in the market and attract more customers to your business. Demand Prediction Inventory365’s demand prediction uses market data, machine learning, and consumer and business behavior to accurately forecast demand for your products. The algorithm takes into account factors such as historical sales data, seasonal trends, marketing and advertising campaigns, and customer behavior. By analyzing this data, we can provide you with actionable insights and accurate forecasts that enable you to optimize inventory levels, reduce the risk of stockouts, and avoid lost sales. Additionally, Inventory365’s demand prediction helps you adjust your marketing and advertising campaigns based on demand, which improves ROI and reduces marketing costs. AI Assistant with Real-time Chat Inventory365’s AI assistant with real-time chat provides you with personalized assistance and support. With this feature, you can get answers to your questions, resolve issues, and receive guidance on best practices. For example, if you need a sales report for a specific date, you can ask the AI assistant to generate it for you. You can also inquire about specific product inventory levels, and the AI assistant will provide you with real-time updates. Additionally, Inventory365’s real-time chat feature enables you to connect with customer support representatives for immediate assistance. This feature provides you with personalized support and helps you optimize your use of the platform. Schedule a demo today to discover how Inventory365 can enhance your efficiency and boost sales. Schedule a demo Start a free trial Optimize your Inventory Say goodbye to the inefficiencies and inaccuracies of manual tracking methods like spreadsheets or paper. Inventory365 offers a unified solution to automate inventory management, enabling you to track inventory across multiple locations, stores, and warehouses with ease and in real-time. Set inventory targets to maximize profits, while leaving a buffer to help you meet unexpected demand. Increase efficiency with a pre-configured solution featuring all essential modules Optimize operations and drive profitable growth with a comprehensive system that combines robust warehouse, orders, manufacturing, and retail capabilities. All your apps, in one place Inventory365’s innovative integration apps connect with top e-commerce platforms like Shopify , Magento , Amazon , Etsy , eBay , and more for seamless business management. These apps allow businesses to efficiently handle inventory, sales, customer relationships, and financials in one unified system. Experience streamlined order processing, real-time inventory updates, and accurate financial reporting. Gain valuable insights for better decision-making and enhance e-commerce capabilities while ensuring resource efficiency and a smooth customer experience. Never run a report manually again Experience the ease and efficiency of automating critical report generation and delivery with Inventory365’s Scheduled Reports. Set predefined intervals for daily, weekly, or monthly reporting, enabling businesses to consistently monitor performance metrics and progress towards strategic goals. The feature supports various formats, PDF, Excel, and CSV, offering flexibility for data analysis and visualization. Embrace automation with Inventory365 and stay ahead of the curve while proactively addressing challenges and capitalizing on opportunities, saving time and resources. Quick setup in 3 simple steps Sync all your data in real-time Signup no credit card required Limitless One-Click Integration Quickly and easily connect Inventory365 with over 3000 apps using a simple, streamlined process. With this capability, businesses can seamlessly expand their Inventory365 functionality and maximize their operational efficiency Manage your fast-growing business with a single cloud inventory solution to scale and compete without the complexity and cost. column4: We're a Software As A Service company providing a data visualization and processing platform for weather and sensor data.
column6: Stunning Weather Visualization, Designed to Impress - Wet Dog Weather Stunning Weather Visualization Designed to Impress Let's Talk Stunning Weather Visualization, Designed to Impress Let's Talk Data Visualization Our software transforms complex weather data into visually stunning and interactive displays for web and mobile applications. Software as a Service Receive tailored weather visualization produced from your choice of model or custom data in formats to match your specific needs. Custom Data Sets We custom configure our service to process your unique data sets to create a weather visualization tailored to your preferences. What We Build Wet Dog Weather processes weather data to provide comprehensive visualization from public repositories and proprietary models, giving unparalleled insights into current and future conditions. Our platform transforms raw data into engaging visuals, allowing you to grasp complex weather patterns and make informed decisions quickly. Our customers rapidly integrate and customize our web or mobile visuals into their offerings. Learn more How It Works When working with Wet Dog Weather, incorporating our attractive displays is straightforward. Specifically for web applications, we offer a user-friendly toolkit that seamlessly presents data on top of standard web map toolkits. In the case of mobile applications, we provide an intuitive interface that encompasses the entire mapping experience. Who We Are Wet Dog Weather was founded to provide cutting-edge weather and sensor data to enterprise and consumer application markets. We deliver top-quality weather data to drive impressive weather visualization. Despite being a small company, we are dedicated to offering the best real-time weather data visualization services available. Our work is proudly featured in products such as Carrot Weather and TruWeather Solutions ‘ V360. Additionally, we fully support industry standards such as WMTS and WMS. While this may not be the primary reason for choosing our services, it is a bonus. Industries Automotive Aviation Consumer Automotive We offer enterprise-grade weather graphics and tailored data visualization for automotive applications. Our solutions integrate standard and proprietary data sources into sleek in-car displays, web dashboards, and mobile apps, supporting modern and legacy systems. Learn more Aviation Weather data visualization is essential for aviation across general, commercial, and drone operations. We provide enterprise-grade yet consumer-friendly graphics, seamlessly integrating standard and custom data sources into web dashboards, apps, and in-flight displays tailored to user needs. Learn more Consumer Our acclaimed Terrier front-end enables real-time weather visualization across mobile, web, and emerging platforms. It seamlessly overlays popular map toolkits and integrates custom data sources alongside standard weather data. We deliver unified, visually stunning weather displays tailored to your users. Learn more Previous Next 1 2 3 Have a project in mind? We are a leading Software as a Service provider and charge according to the value we deliver. Our customers have the option to rent their own Boxer stack and gain access to our top-of-the-line Terrier front-end libraries. We handle a wide range of standard data sets, a routine practice. In addition, we also process custom data that you either purchase or generate yourself. Customization is where our expertise and innovation come into play, making things even more interesting. Let’s work together on your weather visualization project! Let's Talk Latest Articles Cloud-Based WCS: A Modern Approach to Geospatial Services Discover our cloud-based WCS implementation that combines modern infrastructure with OGC standards for scalable, efficient geospatial services. read more Wet Dog Weather Now Supports Mapbox Mobile Maps SDK Wet Dog Weather expands professional weather visualization support, bringing high-performance rendering and real-time data display to more platforms read more 2024: A Year of Expanding Weather Tech Horizons At 2.5 years old, we’re transforming weather tech by pushing boundaries, launching new products, and exploring uncharted territories. read more

column4: AI has democratized expertise, slashed app deployment times, and unlocked unmatched efficiency. At BeyondRisk AI-6, we’re helping enterprises rethink software development from the ground up. Our platform empowers organizations to build and scale AI-native applications across any domain - merging infrastructure and data. The result? Eliminating data silos and tool sprawl with one single platform, finally. Join us in shaping the future of Enterprise Super Intelligence.
column6: AI-6: Enterprise Super Intelligence AI-6: Enterprise Super Intelligence AI-6: Enterprise Super Intelligence Redefine how enterprises think, build, and scale. Contact us Book a Demo 3x ROI in under 12 months 60% Tool Sprawl Reduction 80% Improved Accuracy Across Data Silos 17x Faster App Deployment Integrations AI Agents Analytics The Engine of Enterprise Super Intelligence Introducing AI-6 Unify domain-savvy agents, data, and automation in one platform—amplifying every facet of your business. Create AI-Native Enterprise Apps At Any Experience Level Low-code/no-code environment, AI prompt managers, and agent editors let anyone craft enterprise workflows, apps, or automations—no deep coding knowledge or specialized background required. Book a Demo No-Code Speed Build enterprise apps quickly AI Prompting Guide task-specific agents for complex tasks Instant Automation Orchestrate workflows with AI Agents End-to-End Toolkit for Intelligent Enterprise Apps From AI-driven data flows to domain-savvy agents—everything you need in one unified platform. Book a Demo Semantic Data Models (Ontologies) AI-Driven Data Transformation (AI ETL) Task Specific Master Agents (TSMAs) Low-Code/No-Code App Builder AI Conversational Analytics Built-In Scalability & Multi-Cloud (BYOC) Support Integrated Security & Governance Semantic Data Models (Ontologies) Captures relationships and domain logic. Crushes silos across the enterprise. Eliminates duplicated schemas. Fuels cross-functional insights. AI-Driven Data Transformation (AI ETL) Leverages AI Agents, minimal coding. Handles structured and unstructured data sources. Continuously adapts to evolving schemas. Eliminates data silos across the enterprise. Task Specific Master Agents (TSMAs) Self-learning agents building enterprise apps. Continuously improve with your data. Democratize expertise, reduce specialized team reliance. Launch new apps fast, avoid vendor lock-in. Low-Code/No-Code App Builder Design enterprise apps with AI Agents. Workflow tools, analytics, chatbots, and more. Accelerates time to value, cuts costs. Fuels cross-functional insights. AI Conversational Analytics Ask questions in natural language. Get instant insights from unified data. No siloed dashboards required. Empower execs and frontline teams alike. Avoid multiple analytics tools’ sprawl. text Built-In Scalability & Multi-Cloud (BYOC) Support Deploy on-prem, private, or public clouds. Bring your own cloud seamlessly (BYOC). Scale effortlessly as workloads grow. Future-proof your investment. Integrated Security & Governance Automate policies, data lineage, role-based access. Ensures compliance, auditability, end-to-end protection. Security built into every layer. Integrated governance at every level. "In under two weeks, AI-6 delivered a working pilot for our infrastructure monitoring use case." Chief Technology Architect, Fortune 200 Retailer Redefining Hyper-Automation for the Enterprise Task-Specific Master Agents (TSMAs) Powered by AI-6 TSSMs (Task Specific Small Models), each TSMA excels at specialized tasks - planning, fixing, and orchestrating operations so your team can focus on strategic goals. Book a Demo Domain Expertise at Scale Powered by TSSMs, each TSMA offers deep domain fluency - eliminating the need for multiple point tools. Scalable & Extensible Architecture Easily add new TSMAs or integrate with existing tools - no vendor sprawl, no rigid lock-in. Hyper-Automation via AI Agents TSMAs autonomously handle routine tasks from detection to fixes, freeing your team for top-tier decisions. Enterprise-Grade Security & Governance Role-based access, data lineage, and compliance checks built in - so every automated action is fully trusted. Augmenting Human Teams TSMAs do the heavy lifting while escalating critical issues to humans for final approval. AI-Driven Ops TSMAs spot, prioritize, and fix issues proactively - slashing downtime and elevating operational efficiency. Supercharge AI Agents with 100+ Integrated Tools Transform Workflows, Not Just Insights Book a Demo Move Beyond AI Assistants Empower Workflows with AI-Driven Decisions Unlock Seamless Automation Connect with Over 100 Tools for Complete Workflow Mastery Create end-to-end orchestration pipelines From routine back-office operations to real-time infrastructure monitoring, cybersecurity anomaly detection, or complex financial workflows like multi-step loan origination (pre-filling forms, verifying borrower data, uploading documents), fraud checks, and continuous compliance verifications. Book a Demo Unified Data Lakehouse Store and transform enterprise data seamlessly. Adaptive AI Orchestration Automate workflows with task-specific AI Agents. Any Domain, Anywhere Handle finance, security, ops—any domain, anywhere. ©2025 AI-6

column4: Developer of risk and security posture management software designed to help business executives with actionable insights for decision-making. The company's AI technology provides insights into business to stay informed and manage, risk, and security and offers features that include observability, application security, aggregation and correlation, productivity and efficiency, predictive analysis, risk monitoring, and more, thereby providing clients with quantified productivity based to identify the risk of working to drive better efficiency initiatives and training and plan sprints.
column6: Unified Security, Continuous Compliance, and Seamless Governance See the 5X Impact: Start Your 14-Day Free Trial of TrustMe.ai Security and compliance shouldn’t slow innovation. Biotech is pushing the frontier of bio in amazing ways: designing proteins from scratch, predicting protein structure, extracting insights from scientific literature, and much more. To take advantage of these recent advances, scientists need better software than the current tangled mess of spreadsheets, notebooks, and slide decks. Sphinx's mission is to empower scientists to make better decisions, faster. We're building a data platform that allows biotech companies to focus on their science and ML, not their data infrastructure. If you’re excited to build software for cutting-edge science that saves lives, please reach out. https://www.sphinxbio.com
column6: Sphinx Bio - The modern biotech data platform Login Sign up Login Sign up Accelerate research cycles by offloading the grunt work. Sphinx is an AI-powered platform that helps life science labs automate complex and labor-intensive data work including parsing, analyses and transformations. Schedule a demo Try Sphinx Scientists at leading life science and biotech institutions trust Sphinx You could be making rapid research breakthroughs… If you weren’t weighed down by hours of tedious data tasks every day. Writing and maintaining custom code Bringing together and analyzing scattered datasets No foolproof way of tracking data lineage Inflexible tools that are too rigid for R&D Slow data analysis that leaves your team stuck waiting for results Errors due to the back and forth between lab and computational teams No time to learn complex new tools or build internal solutions So, we built a better way. Shorten experimental timelines. Error-proof your work. Make better decisions. Our bio-specific platform processes high throughputs in minutes, and our powerful AI agent autonomously assists with analysis. Never wait around for results again. There’s no going back from Sphinx. Here’s why: Our AI agent Metis performs time-consuming data tasks in the background, letting you focus on lab work. Automate data ingestion Run statistical transformations with our AI agent Build publication-grade visualizations Make collaboration easier We’re no-code (but have easy APIs for computational teams). We’re purpose-built for biotechnology. We integrate with your LIMS and other existing tools. Simplify data management and analysis with a 360° cloud-based platform. Work intuitively with Metis, our AI agent Metis works independently, with a transparent record of how it operates. Give Metis instructions or ask questions in natural language and automate hours of data parsing and analysis. Create datasets from various sources, including non-tabular data Parse data from tables, import from an existing database or your LIMs, configure pipelines for parsing non-tabular data and stay flexible. Let Metis do the work for you and review to confirm. Combine your results and your experimental designs into analysis-ready datasets Eliminate tedious data entry and formatting tasks through AI-powered raw data ingestion. Add two or more related datasets to create dataset collections. Run statistical tests, fit curves, and transform your data easily Use pre-built bio-specific statistical transformations without writing a single line of code. Build publication-ready visualizations Turn your data into stunning, interactive visualizations. Capture scientist annotations Add relevant context and comments to your data and analyses, track lineage, and make your science truly collaborative. Learn more about Sphinx Meet Metis. An AI agent designed for life science labs. Metis assists with complex data transformations and analysis problems by taking actions based on your requests. Provide Metis with the raw data and natural-language instructions or queries, and step back as it works out complex data transformations and analyses autonomously. Metis can help you with: Creating datasets from various sources Configuring pipelines Fitting curves and performing statistical tests Creating and editing analyses Writing custom analysis code Sphinx helps you go to market faster. column4: Named a Cool Vendor in the 2024 Gartner® Cool Vendors™ in Digital Workplace Applications. Artificial Intelligence startup whose purpose is to elevate human potential by decluttering people's lives. Our vision is to become the leading intelligent layer that orchestrates and streamlines the majority of social interactions, freeing up people from coordination cost and inefficient rules of social engagement. We provide Digital Serendipity that makes Hybrid Work a sustainable reality, anywhere you are. Tweelin's telemetry-based Artificial Intelligence (AI) transforms 1:1 scheduled meetings (on average 40% of total calendar events) into impromptu conversations, presented at the right time for both parties involved. The AI works across multiple devices and apps, connecting people based on the best possible communication channel they have in common, at any given time. Say goodbye to: ■ Missed calls ■ Endless "when can we talk" message exchanges ■ Time wasted scheduling unneeded meetings ■ Procrastinated decisions due to unavailable time slots Instead, embrace: ■ A more fluid day that adapts to the way you work ■ Serendipitous conversations happening asap or whenever you need ■ Less overtime ■ Better work-life balance Tweelin is ISO 27001:2022 Certified.

column6: Centrox AI | Full-Cycle Gen AI and Custom LLM Dev Services Ship Production-Ready Gen AI Faster Focus on building your product, not your AI infrastructure. We handle the complexities of Gen AI development from data curation to deployment, so you can accelerate your time-to-market and gain a competitive edge. Bridging the Gap between research and real-world applications We at Centrox AI understand the challenges companies face when navigating the complexities of Gen AI development and deployment. Centrox AI is a full-cycle AI development company on a mission to augment business that are moving the innovation needle in Gen AI. We want to enable you to focus on your core product and achieve your business goals faster while we take over your Gen AI development life cycle. We want to put our AI technical depth, collaborative approach, and commitment to delivering to good use by helping you out. Centrox services Services End-to-End Gen AI Services From Idea To Impact Centrox AI offers full-cycle Gen AI development services designed to meet your specific needs and accelerate your product roadmap. Data Solutions: The Foundation of High-Performing LLMs Read in detail about our services. Annotation & Labeling Our AI-driven annotation tools streamline the processing and labeling of your data, saving you time and resources. Our skilled team of annotators reviews and fine-tunes these AI-generated annotations, guaranteeing exceptional accuracy and consistency tailored to your unique requirements. By choosing our data annotation services, you're investing in quality that enhances your project's success. Learn More → Data Validation & Quality Assurance We implement rigorous quality assurance processes to validate your data, identify and address any inconsistencies, and ensure your LLM is trained on the most reliable information. Learn More → Custom LLM Development We'll collaborate closely with your team to design and develop a custom LLM architecture optimized for your specific domain and use case. We'll leverage advanced techniques such as transfer learning, fine-tuning, and reinforcement learning to ensure your model achieves state-of-the-art performance. Learn More → Custom Chatbot Development We'll build intelligent conversational AI solutions that seamlessly integrate into your existing product and provide natural language understanding, engaging interactions, and actionable insights. We'll ensure your chatbot aligns with your brand voice and delivers a superior user experience. Learn More → Fine-Tuning & Optimization We'll fine-tune pre-trained LLMs on your proprietary data, enabling them to adapt to your domain-specific language and tasks. We'll employ cutting-edge optimization techniques to maximize efficiency, reduce inference latency, and minimize computational costs. Learn More → Agentic AI Partner with Centrox AI to develop intelligent AI agents and workflows that automate tasks, make decisions, and drive business growth. With our expertise in Agentic AI workflows, we can help you with developing custom solutions tailored to your specific needs. Learn More → Deployment & Scaling We'll deploy your LLM into your production environment, handling infrastructure provisioning, scaling, and monitoring to ensure high availability and optimal performance. We'll work with you to address any security or compliance concerns. Learn More → Optimization We’ll optimize your MLOps by enhancing its efficiency, scalability and performance through automating the workflows, refined training, hyperparameter tuning, and minimizing the cost to produce a more reliable and scalable business aligned machine learning deployment. Comment end Learn More → Evaluation We'll leverage advanced analytics and visualization tools to provide detailed metrics and insights into your LLM's performance, enabling you to track progress, identify areas for improvement and make data-driven decisions. Learn More → Solutions Centrox's Solutions Explore our suite of production-ready Generative AI products, built to address real-world challenges across diverse industries. Health Bot Real-Estate Chatbot Body Measurements Tool Fitness and Wellbeing Solution Mental Health Chatbot Provides empathetic support and personalized coping strategies for individuals experiencing emotional distress.Trained on a curated dataset of evidence-based therapeutic techniques and mental health resources. Solution Real-Estate Chatbot Provides intelligent property search, answer queries, schedule viewings, and offer tailored recommendations.Integrates with real estate databases and APIs to provide up-to-date property information and streamline the customer journey. Solution Body Measurements Tool Utilizes computer vision and deep learning algorithms to accurately estimate body dimensions from just two photos.Enables precise garment fitting, personalized recommendations, and reduced return rates for fashion retailers. Solution Labelling Dresses with AI Automates the process of tagging fashion products with relevant attributes (style, color, neckline, etc.) using computer vision and image recognition techniques.Improves efficiency, accuracy, and consistency in product cataloging for fashion retailers. Industries Empowering AI Innovators Across Industries Generative AI and LLMs are transforming industries across the board. Centrox has partnered with companies to deliver impactful LLM solutions in diverse domains. Medical Text Generation Automate the creation of clinical notes, discharge summaries, and other medical documents, freeing up valuable time for healthcare professionals and improving documentation accuracy. Personalized Health Recommendations Leverage LLMs to analyze patient data and generate tailored health recommendations, promoting proactive health management and improving patient outcomes. Mental Health Support Deploy our Mental Health Chatbot, a compassionate AI companion trained on evidence-based therapeutic techniques to support emotional well-being and offer personalized coping strategies. AI-Powered Design Tools Accelerate the design process with generative models that assist in creating innovative concepts, generating unique patterns and textures, and streamlining production workflows, fostering creativity and efficiency. Personalized Fashion Recommendations Leverage LLMs to analyze customer preferences, body measurements, and style goals to offer tailored fashion recommendations, enhancing the online shopping experience and driving conversions. Dynamic Content Generation Automate the creation of product descriptions, social media captions, and marketing materials, saving time and resources while ensuring consistent brand messaging. Property Descriptions & Listings Utilize LLMs to generate compelling and informative property descriptions and listings, highlighting key features and attracting potential buyers. Virtual Property Tours Create immersive 3D virtual tours with AI-generated environments and interactive elements, allowing potential buyers to explore properties remotely and enhancing their decision-making process. Personalized Property Recommendations Leverage LLMs to analyze user preferences and search history to provide tailored property recommendations, improving the efficiency of property search and discovery. Fraud Detection & Prevention Implement advanced AI models to analyze transaction data, identify patterns indicative of fraudulent activity, and proactively prevent financial losses. Personalized Financial Advice Leverage LLMs to provide tailored financial recommendations based on individual risk profiles, investment goals, and market trends. Customer Support Automation Deploy intelligent chatbots to handle routine customer inquiries, provide account information, and assist with basic transactions, improving efficiency and customer satisfaction. column4: BioSked is a fast-growing company based in both the US and Europe that specializes in cloud-based technology for healthcare workflow optimization. Focusing on healthcare scheduling automation, the flagship product Momentum was created in 2010 to help radiologists optimize their schedules. Momentum has evolved into a web-based solution with a mobile app, becoming a primary management tool for healthcare scheduling & human resource time allocation for medical offices, specialty groups, departments, hospitals, or multi-facility entities. BioSked is committed to continually advance Momentum to meet the expectations of our customers, physicians and healthcare professionals around the world. Agility, transparency and dedication to customer satisfaction will always be the priority for BioSked
column6: Momentum by Biosked | Healthcare Staff Scheduling Software Healthcare Staff Scheduling Software Powered by AI Schedule your workforce 10x faster, improve fairness, and enhance job satisfaction—so you can focus on patient care Request a Demo Optimize Your Workforce Utilization By reducing time spent on scheduling staff, you can re-focus on what really matters: patient care! BioSked Serves Users Countries Momentum’s healthcare staff scheduling software is built to accommodate the unique needs of your organization, across professions, departments and locations.  Market challenges we hear Lack of scheduling automation Lack of resource capacity & coverage assurance Challenge handling employee time-off & shift swap requests and approvals Need updated / real-time schedule access for staff Can’t manage multi-site scheduling Incur high labor costs Need compliance management  Who Momentum helps Hospitals & Health Systems Group Practices Clinical Research Various Specialties: Anesthesiology, Cardiology, Pulmonary, Gastroenterology, Radiology, OB/GYN, Pathology, etc. Multi-Site Locations, Groups, Clinics Residencies Learn More about how Momentum streamlines the creation, management and access of staff schedules Learn More about Momentum Real Results: Measurable Benefits of Momentum % Less Overtime % Faster Schedule Building % Fewer Scheduling Issues AI-Enhanced Scheduling: 15 Years of Expertise Our smart engine harnesses 15 years of real-world data and advanced machine learning research to streamline your scheduling decisions and free up your valuable time. We partner with leading academic institutions, including the Bern University of Applied Sciences (BFH) and the École Nationale Supérieure de l’Électronique et de ses Applications (ENSEA) , supported by the Swiss government , to continuously drive innovation. Momentum offers effective scheduling for all types and sizes of healthcare organizations Time management impacts every aspect of Healthcare, most pointedly employee satisfaction and retention which directly impacts patient care, treatment and satisfaction. We understand the importance of streamlined & equitable staff scheduling, efficient time-off management, and effortless real-time schedule access. Not only does enhanced staff scheduling save healthcare organizations an abundance of time, it also improves team communication, ultimately resulting in staff satisfaction & retention. Elevate Healthcare Staff Scheduling with Momentum by BioSked Automated Provider Scheduling Create & manage employee & call schedules. Repeat ability. Chelsi Schichtenberg Scheduling Administrator Lakewood Health System  Momentum gives me a really effective visualization of the staffing in each clinic, with this I am able to quickly make informed decisions. Heather Naef Scheduling Administrator Virginia Garcia Memorial Health Center Why BioSked?  Dedicated Account Management We pride ourselves on maintaining ongoing, collaborative relationships with Momentum’s users through proactive customer service. From day one, we will work with you to establish a comprehensive understanding of your organization’s needs. Together, we will develop a fully tailored scheduling strategy and train your team on how to utilize it. Even after the schedules are in place, we will remain an ongoing resource to you. We are happy to help answer questions, provide further training, and strategize new ways of streamlining your organization’s scheduling efforts.  Built to Scale Along with Your Organization Today, the workplace is ever-evolving. From organizational restructuring to departmental growth, Momentum is built to accommodate each change that may come your way. By working with your dedicated Project Manager, we will develop a tailored solution to reflect your team’s changing needs. Ready to optimize your healthcare organization’s staff scheduling? column6: Warehouse Automation, Robotics Integration, Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs) We value your privacy We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking "Accept All", you consent to our use of cookies. Customize Consent Preferences We use cookies to help you navigate efficiently and perform certain functions. You will find detailed information about all cookies under each consent category below. The cookies that are categorized as "Necessary" are stored on your browser as they are essential for enabling the basic functionalities of the site. ... Always Active Necessary cookies are required to enable the basic features of this site, such as providing secure log-in or adjusting your consent preferences. These cookies do not store any personally identifiable data. Cookie ssr-caching Duration Less than a minute Description The ssr-caching cookie is set by WIX and indicates how a site was rendered. Cookie hs Duration session Description Wix platform sets this cookie for security purposes. Cookie svSession Duration 1 year 1 month 4 days Description Wix platform sets this cookie to identify unique visitors and track a visitor’s session on a site. Cookie XSRF-TOKEN Duration session Description Wix set this cookie for security purposes. Cookie bSession Duration 1 hour Description Wix set this cookie in context with load balancing to improve user experience. Functional cookies help perform certain functionalities like sharing the content of the website on social media platforms, collecting feedback, and other third-party features. No cookies to display. Analytical cookies are used to understand how visitors interact with the website. These cookies help provide information on metrics such as the number of visitors, bounce rate, traffic source, etc. No cookies to display. Performance cookies are used to understand and analyze the key performance indexes of the website which helps in delivering a better user experience for the visitors. No cookies to display. Advertisement cookies are used to provide visitors with customized advertisements based on the pages you visited previously and to analyze the effectiveness of the ad campaigns. No cookies to display. Other uncategorized cookies are those that are being analyzed and have not been classified into a category as yet. Cookie debug Duration never Description No description available. Meet the team Neal Mann Co-founder Experienced product and strategy leader for global companies and agencies Markham Nolan Co-founder Seasoned digital operations leader for global media organisations. Filipe Dobreira Co-founder Tech leader, former Impraise co-founder & CTO, alumnus of Y-Combinator Marie-Hélène Mai Engineer Deeply experienced engineer, making NOAN work seamlessly from front to back Anna Langeveld Partnerships First point of contact for NOAN's growing suite of top-tier global partners Stephen Clements Design A global leader in creative design and marketing, an investor & advisor to NOAN Andy Masson Growth Experienced and hands-on product-led growth expert. Scaled multiple startups from 0-1 and beyond. FAQs Got A Question? What AI does NOAN use? NOAN uses AI models from OpenAI (ChatGPT) and Anthropic (Claude). We will be implementing a module using Perplexity soon. You do not need to have accounts, paid or otherwise, on the AI models to use NOAN. The cost of using the models is baked into your subscription cost. Does NOAN integrate with Zapier? NOAN does integrate with Zapier. Our Zapier app means you can connect NOAN's AI assistants to output from any one of 7,000 apps in the Zapier marketplace. Can NOAN advise me on my business strategy? Yes, NOAN is built to advise entrepreneurs and small business teams on their strategy. NOAN's AI assistants learn from your input as they build a knowledge system for your company, creating a single source of truth about your business for all AI assistants to work from. NOAN was built to give small businesses the same kind of strategic guidance that Fortune 500 companies hire in from Accenture, McKinsey and the like. Can NOAN write blog articles? NOAN is the perfect AI blog writer. Because its AI assistants know your company's product, strategy and audience inside out, just tell NOAN what blog you want to write and it'll automatically contextualize it to reference the right aspects of your business. Use the SEO assistant to ensure they're fully optimized as part of a broader SEO strategy. Blogging has never been easier. What features do I get with my subscription? Ability to create & run 5 projects with a basic subscription 11 AI Assistants - all available 24/7 to guide you, shape your content and build your strategy Ability to upload documents directly to the AI assistants so they can extract insights Unlimited AI generations Integrated with Zapier so you can connect any one of 7,000 apps Ability to add team members and control permission levels at a granular level Ability to onboard clients and develop their strategy via a white-labelled 'Client Mode' experience ‍ ‍ The New Standard In Business Work smarter, scale faster Try Now Try Now Free AI Webinar Join Neal & Markham to learn how to automate your business using the NOAN Zapier node. Cedar understands pest control’s complex customer needs. We handle multi-property residential accounts, commercial accounts, and more. Need monthly billing? No sweat. Cedar handles payments and invoices with numerous customization options. Do You Have a Customer Portal? Helping PCOs put their best (digital) foot forward is one of Cedar’s strongest advantages. All of Cedar’s essential customer-facing reports are sent to customers and can be edited live. We do not auto-charge for using our pest control software solutions, but rather have clean and transparent pricing. Click here to request a demo and custom quote. How Is My Data Transferred Over? Cedar is an expert in data migration. We move over all of your contacts, offer safe places to store your historical data, and help you create all future subscriptions and jobs into our pest control software so you can hit the ground running. column4: The leader in Last Mile Medical Logistics SaaS and Services. Our end-to-end medical logistics services and portfolio of SaaS solutions drives operational efficiency and cost savings for health systems, labs, and DME providers. Our SaaS solutions streamlines workflows and reduces archaic manual processes, driving control and visibility for supply chain and operations teams while enhancing service levels. Our software manages workflows involving the efficient movement of medical specimens, supplies, equipment and medication. In addition to our SaaS solutions, we provide logistics services to a range of care providers, including IDNs, AMCs, Labs and DME providers.

column4: The essential platform that generates, “Ready to close a deal” meetings between great Tech companies of the world and “I’m ready to buy” Latin American companies. Our AI-driven platform smooths out existing operations, allowing new sales and purchasing processes while significantly reducing the Customer Acquisition Cost.
column6: IT - Wise Meetings Ir al contenido Revolucionamos la venta de tecnología IT en Latam con IA . Tu navegador no soporta el video. Relaciones comerciales para IT providers y empresas Latinoamericanas que compran tecnología IT. Agenda una demostración Comienza ahora Utilice el Poder de la IA a su favor Somos un modelo de IA creado por vendedores de tecnología para vendedores de tecnología Resolution Alligment Result as a Service Acceleration Cost effectiveness 2.3x SQL más rápidos 13.8% Reducción del CAC 3.1M Empresas de Latinoamérica Lo que realmente nos define es: RaaS—Result as a Service En Wise Meetings conectamos a los equipos comerciales con clientes reales, listos para avanzar, en el momento justo. Entregamos conversaciones con intención . Nuestro modelo combina cost-effectiveness, acceleration, alignment y resolution, eliminando la fricción del proceso comercial inicial y permitiendo que el vendedor se enfoque directamente en cerrar . Para quienes entienden que la velocidad, la precisión y el ventajas competitivas son ventajas competitivas, no hay alternativa más inteligente. Ver Preguntas Frecuentes “This project has the potential to create massive impact in Latam, I love the concept of creating a way to deliver demand generation as a service.” Nicolas Meligrana Head of Channels Sales Americas “IBM changed it’s whole Latin America strategy, we work through channels, and I can see this project working great with our channels and new strategy.” Maria Paula Bejarano Ecosystem Marketing Manager “I definitely like the whole concept; I would like to run a pilot of the platform with our team whenever you have it ready to go.” Luis Camilo Rodriguez Field Marketing Manager Latin America Planes PLAN ESTÁNDAR $0 USD/mes Para empresas o vendedores que buscan cerrar oportunidades rápidamente a partir de las demandas de soluciones IT ya publicadas. Recomendado para quienes requieren resultados rápidos sin procesos de personalización y cuenta con autonomía en abordar diversos mercados. PLAN PREMIUM $50 USD/mes Para empresas que requieren un flujo constante de oportunidades para soluciones IT personalizadas según su offering, segmento, industria o territorio. Diseñado para empresas que requieren alineación estratégica entre marketing y ventas, y demandan calidad superior en la generación de oportunidad con clientes cualificados. ¿Necesitas un plan a tu medida? Agenda una reunión × Comparación de planes Característica Plan estándar Plan premium Costo mensual USD $0 / mes USD $50 /mes Notificación privilegiada de oportunidades disponibles.a ✓ Sí ✓ Sí, 72 horas antes del lanzamiento público. Tipos y categorías de clientes ✓ Los publicados en la plataforma como disponibles ✓ Parametrizados según offering de su marca con prompt avanzado, para tipo y categoría Precio por MQL desde USD $180 USD $140 Precio por SQL desde USD $290 USD $250 Atención KAM No ✓ Sí, seguimiento cada dos semanas Soporte /consultoría estratégica No ✓ Sí, Generación de demanda estructurada según kick off Numero de agendas según plan ✓ Hasta 2 por publicación ✓ Sin techo: Flujo constante de reuniones con TDM( tomadores de decisión ) según demanda FAQ ¿Por qué pagar una suscripción más el servicio? Porque la suscripción no es un costo, es acceso: a tecnología, velocidad de ejecución y priorización. Es como tener a tu proveedor de confianza on demand, sin contratar equipo propio. ¿Qué garantía tengo de que lo que me entregan vale lo que pago? Garantizamos SQLs calificados según criterios técnicos, decisor identificado, contacto real y fit comercial. No entregamos leads, entregamos decisiones preparadas para avanzar. ¿Qué pasa si no uso nada en un mes? No pierdes. Accedes a consultoría, inteligencia de mercado y planeación comercial. Además, puedes acumular créditos de conocimiento. Te damos valor estratégico constante, incluso sin ejecución. Yo ya tengo equipo comercial, ¿para qué pagar esto? Tu equipo de ventas cierra, tu equipo de mercadeo siembra. Pero ¿quién les entrega clientes listos para cerrar en tiempo real? ¿No es mejor pagar por proyecto cuando lo necesite? Puedes hacerlo, pero perderás tiempo valio$o en briefings, procesos, y disponibilidad. La suscripción te da acceso inmediato, mejor precio por unidad y trato preferencial. Es como entrar por la puerta VIP. ¿Y si quiero cancelar? Sin cláusulas de permanencia. Puedes suspender con 15 días de aviso. El modelo es de confianza mutua, no de ataduras. ¿Y si después me sale más caro que buscar otro proveedor puntual? Nosotros ya hicimos esa tarea : El CAC aislado no es suficiente. Se compara contra el LTV (valor del cliente en el tiempo) para saber si la inversión en adquisición es rentable. Regla financiera común: LTV / CAC ≥ 3 (por cada dólar invertido en adquirir, se deben recuperar al menos 3). ¿Por qué confiar en ustedes? ¿Qué los hace distintos? Porque no somos una agencia de mercadeo que intenta hacer ventas ni un BPO cobrando por hacer llamadas. Somos una empresa de tecnología que domina perfectamente el proceso de pre-venta, venta y post-venta de tecnología IT. Es decir, somos de tu equipo. ¿Y si pido un SQL y no convierte? La calidad del SQL está 100% garantizada: entregamos contactos con presupuesto, autoridad, necesidad, cronograma y disposición a avanzar. Cumplimos con todos los criterios que definen una oportunidad calificada para la compra de tecnología informática —tú sabes que no es lo mismo que vender cualquier otro producto o servicio-. Con esto, el vendedor podrá ejercer su rol de cierre. Así funciona un engranaje sano entre producto y vendedor. column4: Small and large organizations alike face similar business challenges. Unfortunately, small and mid-sized companies don't have the same software resources available compared to their larger counterparts. Here at Archarina, we believe that every business deserves well-designed, efficient software solutions of equal (if not better!) quality as those enterprise products. We also know that sophisticated software solutions don't need to be expensive or complex. That's why we built the ArcSuite: well-designed, easy-to-use, and reasonably priced software applications to optimize every facet of your organization.
column6: Cloud Software Suite for Business - Archarina Tools to transform every aspect of your business Automation-enabled workflows ensure a friction-free process, delivering improved business outcomes. How? Streamline billing with versatile pricing models and usage-based options. Schedule future-dated and back-dated invoices—avoid last minute hurry. Get out-of-the-box reports on revenue projection, and near-term cash flow scenario. Master every step of your process flow and achieve faster, smarter work with our range of applications. ArcTime Automatically track your team's work time, how they progress on various tasks, monitor project budget, etc —all in real- time. column4: Topaz Biosciences is developing powerful biological solutions by leveraging access to vast unexplored microbial diversity…
column6: Topaz Biosciences | Engineering the Skin Microbiome top of page The microbiome is the future of skin care Skin conditions like eczema and acne are caused or exacerbated by the growth of specific bacteria on the skin.​ ​ ​ By building on protein scaffolds evolved in nature to control bacterial growth, our enzyme technology selectively reduces harmful bacteria while leaving beneficial bacteria intact.​ Learn more Our enzyme ingredients are clinically proven to rebalance and restore a healthy skin microbiome​ Backed by rigorous laboratory research and clinical testing, we are developing enzyme ingredients that can be formulated into skin care products and are proven to rebalance the microbiome of eczema and acne -prone skin and improve skin health.​ Learn more We unlock solutions hidden in nature >99% of natural diversity remains uncatalogued and unstudied.​ ​ Our proprietary metagenomics platform provides unique access to vast amounts of unexplored microbial diversity, allowing us to uncover enzyme activities and properties that surpass any human design. Learn more The most elegant biological inventions come from nature itself.​ We harness natural biodiversity and synthetic biology to design enzymes that precisely manipulate the skin microbiome.​ The most elegant biological inventions come from nature itself.​ We harness natural biodiversity and synthetic biology to design enzymes that precisely manipulate the skin microbiome.​ The microbiome is the future of skin care Skin conditions like eczema and acne are caused or exacerbated by the growth of specific bacteria on the skin.​ ​ ​ By building on protein scaffolds evolved in nature to control bacterial growth, our enzyme technology selectively reduces harmful bacteria while leaving beneficial bacteria intact.​ Learn more Our enzyme ingredients are clinically proven to rebalance and restore a healthy skin microbiome​ Backed by rigorous laboratory research and clinical testing, we are developing enzyme ingredients that can be formulated into skin care products and are proven to rebalance the microbiome of eczema and acne -prone skin and improve skin health.​ Learn more We unlock solutions hidden in nature >99% of natural diversity remains uncatalogued and unstudied.​ ​ Our proprietary metagenomics platform provides unique access to vast amounts of unexplored microbial diversity, allowing us to uncover enzyme activities and properties that surpass any human design.
