column4: We are driven to help our clients optimize ROI while reducing risk. Capital is invested into Assets, People support Assets, Compliance ensures People are doing the right things. We use technology AI to simplify how employees interact with assets. Operations, Safety, Environmental, Maintenance, Procurement all have touchpoints in maximizing an assets potential and reducing its risk, but all the specialty software systems for each department leave the boots on the ground confused, and overworked. For years, we’ve pushed more work, (especially compliance) down the organizational ladder. The effect: Lower labor productivity and higher wages. Instead of focusing on individual metrics, we focus on the area where everyone overlaps, Assets! An asset is a broad class but our focus is on Fixed Equipment, Fixed Property, Mobile Equipment, Inventory, and Capital. We've already developed a smarter way to manage MSHA documentation like Workplace Exams, Site Specific, and Miner Training Certification. We are going on seamless mobile equipment inspection and incident/accident forms as well. Check out our demo videos on https://youtube.com/@ProComplyNet
column6: Home - ProComplyNet Compliance ONBOARDING CONTRACTORS, VENDORS AND PROVIDERS IN A MATTER OF HOURS Network WIDESPREAD NETWORK OF CONTRACTORS AND VENDORS WITH EASY TO SEARCH SAFETY PARAMETERS, TRADES AND MORE Hiring Organizations EASY TO USE COMPLIANCE RULES BUILDER THAT ARE READY TO BE APPLIED IN MINUTES Gatekeeper THE GATEKEEPER IS A SIMPLE MOBILE APPLICATION THAT MANAGES THE ACCESS TO A work SITE and ALLOWS THE site manager TO REVIEW THE COMPLIANCE STATUS OF THE CONTRACTOR OR VENDOR Previous Next about us ProComplyNet is the only tool you need for compliance, risk mitigation, site and contractors control - all in one place. ProComplyNet is changing the way hiring organizations, contractors and vendors work together, making the process Faster, Cheaper and Simpler. Nowadays getting a contractor or vendor to comply to the hiring organization’s standards can take 4+ weeks. This creates a big problem for everyone involved because the vetting process is too long and may cause project delays or even losing the desired contractor to another company. Using other compliance programs may improve the process, but still requires a human to review the information, making the process slower, more expensive and complex. Our advanced technology of AI reduces the need for a human to review the information, saving time, money and manpower. We invite you and your company to request a demo. P Allow access control to a work site using our Gatekeeper mobile application for contractors, vendors and site manager. C AI Powered compliance verification process that allows contractors and vendors to onboard to a project quickly and easily. Hiring organizations can create and update compliance standards with an easy-to-use rules builder engine for all documents. column4: While migrating to the cloud, enterprises face challenges such as shrinking timelines, hard to find technical resources, and a fragmented tools market, not to mention enough budgets. What if you can manage your entire hybrid cloud journey from a single SaaS platform without having to write any code? Concierto is the only platform that allows you to migrate applications, data and infrastructure to any of the 3 major clouds and manage your hybrid cloud from a single pane of glass. Concierto Migrate is a Zero Code platform that allows you to migrate applications and infrastructure in bulk from On-Prem to AWS, Azure, or GCP and between clouds, saving up to 40% time and costs. Concierto Manage is a rapid deployment SaaS platform for managing all your cloud environments. Leverage hundreds of readymade automations and wizards to accelerate your services and reduce costs by up to 30%. Concierto Maximize is a multi-dimensional predictive and preventive analytics platform covering operations, performance, events, automation, and fin-ops across AWS, Azure, GCP, and Private Clouds - allowing IT to set up plans, budgets, controls, triggers, and alerts to optimize capacity, prevent cloud waste and reduce costs. The differentiator: • With over three decades of experience in infra, the team built Concierto for the hybrid cloud lifecycle – ground up. • Concierto is a SaaS platform that takes 8-10 weeks to configure and deploy. • Concierto is pre-integrated with monitoring, security, event management, asset management, and AWS, Azure, or GCP-provided tools and can be integrated with the tools of your choice in approx. 6 weeks. • Concierto is hyper-automated with automations and can also absorb automations written by you on Ansible. • Concierto does not need deep cloud-specific skills. With a harmonized process for multiple clouds, Concierto allows IT to create shared services teams that scale across clouds and on-prem.

column4: Kiip is a platform that simplifies how social services are delivered and accessed. Kiip provides document storage and transfer, forms & applications management, and a robust set of client communication and management tools. Kiip expedites organizations’ ability to serve their clients and empowers those clients to help themselves.
column6: Kiip - Modern case management for better outcomes 0 Build relationships, not formulas Kiip is modern case management for better outcomes Get started today Easy to use Kiip is ready to go out of the box, no customization or app download needed. Our simple and modern interface allows you to focus on what’s important. Powerful Manage your clients, documents, case notes, and referrals in one centralized tool. You’ll be amazed by what you can achieve when everything lives in one place. Free Kiip is completely free for you and your clients. We’re backed by Findhelp — the largest provider network in the country. We don’t sell your data. The bigger our network, the better we can strengthen the social safety net. Do your best work with the right tools Client management Search and filter through all of your clients in your directory. Chat with clients, share links and resources, and work together on Kiip. Track it all with with private case notes. Referrals Send and receive referrals across the Findhelp network, track status updates, and document client outcomes, all within Kiip. Mark services rendered and close the loop. Documents and forms Upload and share documents to collaborate with your clients. Complete intakes, assessments, consent forms, and more. Put an end to incomplete documentation hindering applications. Reporting See referrals sent, documents uploaded, and forms completed. Watch this space for more exciting updates to reporting soon! Data privacy and security Kiip’s secure platform is designed specifically to handle clients’ and providers’ sensitive data. Manage documents in a safe environment, chat freely, take case notes, and rest assured knowing that it’s all private, encrypted and safe. Empower your clients Incomplete documentation is the #1 reason for delayed applications. With Kiip, your clients have dedicated document backup and storage — for life — where they can manage their own document library. It’s completely free, with no strings attached. Clients can choose which files to share with you and any other program they’re working with. If, for some unthinkable reason, you stop using Kiip, your clients will still have full access to their account and documents. Find your zen Tired of jumping between emails, text messages, Post-its, spreadsheets and paper forms? With Kiip, your work lives all in one place. Doing less paperwork means having more time to help people. Hear from our customers “When I first saw Kiip, the ease of it really grabbed my attention. Anyone can figure out how to use this. I love that it’s a two-way platform: clients can upload their documents so they can have them, and then I, as a case manager, can see it, too, if I need it.” Nancy Parcher Community Health Worker Program Director, St. Clare Health Mission “I have not exited nearly as many clients as I usually would. I've only exited 20 people, and normally I'm exiting 100 people at a time. And some of these people that I'm exiting off have actually completed the program, so they're not even exits because they're not in compliance — they're exits because they're housed.” Junisa Dailey Operations Manager, Fathers and Mothers Who Care “Kiip is a cultural shift. Going digital will be more than just a workflow change for the HOPICS staff and clients — the Kiip team has made this change so much smoother with their endless support of our team.” Ben Kay Assistant Director, HOPICS “I know that [Kiip is] a wonderful system and I know that as the system continues to modify, it just gets better. It has been much easier for us. We've retained a lot more clients using Kiip because some of them just don't have the capability to come in [to our office].” Junisa Dailey Operations Manager, Fathers and Mothers Who Care “This is incredible, I don’t have another word. I’m pretty blown away.“ Joe Ruprecht Senior Account Executive, Amazon Web Services “We have conversations all the time about how Kiip has alleviated some of the stress that our org usually experiences. And our clients say that their stresses about documents have also been alleviated using this product…You all are doing an awesome job with this product. It’s really working for us.” Linda Kelly Executive Director, Fathers and Mothers Who Care “I was the person who had all those documents in these great big bundles and carried them around with me, so [Kiip] is a much more refined, elegant and practical solution. It's just terrific. I think it's wonderful." Joyce Millard Hoie First Place parent Learn more Sign up for a webinar Product overview How to get started Get started today Kiip is a free tool built specifically for community organizations like yours. We’re rolling it out as quickly as we can. Sign up today and we’ll be in touch when it’s your turn to onboard your organization. We can’t wait to meet you. Join Kiip now ­ ­

column6: tru® Strength Realization No items found. No items found. Do you know what inspires the best in your people ? Do your people find purpose, meaning, and fulfillment in their work? Are work tasks aligned with the strengths and aspirations of your people? Unlock the full potential of your people tru ® is the whole-person intelligence platform that aligns individual strengths, purpose, and aspirations with what your organization needs to get done - driving performance, engagement, and retention from the inside out. As AI becomes more mainstream, tru helps leaders intelligently redeploy people for maximum impact. See how tru works . Why tru ® ? In today's dynamic work environment, business leaders face unprecedented workforce and productivity challenges. tru® Strength Realization offers a transformative approach to engage employees by aligning their unique strengths and aspirations with organizational goals. Enhance performance by leveraging individual strengths. Boost retention through meaningful employee engagement. Empower managers with insights for effective team development. Cultivate a distinctive company culture aligned with employee values. By uncovering what truly fulfills each individual, tru® lays the groundwork for a thriving, purpose-driven organization. My Path Forward - Develop a personalized, purpose-driven growth plan that aligns one’s unique strengths with meaningful work opportunities, guiding career progression and development Looking within to unleash peak performance and personal fulfillment 1 Identify personal and professional Peak Experiences in which high achievement and high energy flow were present. column4: Mekanoid is the intelligent automation platform for cybersecurity, built with AI foundations to help overburdened cyber defense teams to continuously prepare and respond to future threats. Currently in private beta.
column6: Mekanoid Prepare and respond to cyber threats without playbooks Meet Mekanoid, AI-powered automation for resource-constrained teams. Mekanoid enables transition from static workflows and alert-driven response to proactive defense . Build resilience and respond autonomously to future attacks using your current infrastructure and talent. How does it work? Built on top of AI foundations of semantic modeling and reasoning, Mekanoid uses existing security infrastructure to enable context-driven decisions across digital environments and teams. Our public MKND ontology uses and extends MITRE D3FEND , ATT&CK, OCSF , NIST VDO, and other standards to enable proactive defense automation without playbooks. Use cases Mekanoid seamlessly integrates across your existing infrastructure, automating operational tasks across the entirety of the cybersecurity event management lifecycle. Up-to-date inventory Cross-reference cyber asset inventories, activity logs, and infrastructure to maintain the latest state of the internal attack surface and to assure monitoring coverage. Cyber hygiene Automate maintenance of cybersecurity best practices for your organization, from monitoring patch levels to enforcing least privilege and strong authentication. Attack containment Confidently launch countermeasures even on low confidence detections, as Mekanoid drives response actions tailored to the internal environment. Autonomous threat hunting Recursively track every low-confidence alert and observable by navigating between external and internal data sources until a conclusive closure. Integrations Our cross-stack integrations are straightforward, open-source, and available to all platform users. While the list of supported solutions is constantly growing, check out our GitHub repos to see which integrations are available today, and where we could use help. F.A.Q. Testimonials The approach Mekanoid is taking to security automation is the freshest weve seen to date. Ross Haleliuk Author/Blogger, Venture in Security Effective incident response starts long before you have an alert. Chris Smedberg Director of Cyber Security, Advance Publications Inc. A game changer for small teams. Emilio Santiago CISO, Rushmore Loan Amazing! Monte Fabiani VP of Cyber Detection and Response, City National Bank We cannot 'playbook' our way out of incident response. DevSecOps Lead, Leading CRM Vendor Let's collaborate! Learn about gaining early platform access or joining our Design Partner Program . By the way, we hate spam and would never sell your personal information.

How does Subtrak help in improving the efficiency of construction projects? Subtrak simplifies documenting your company’s unique processes and workflows, reducing redundant work and clarifying team expectations. This clarity leads to better efficiency and project execution. Can Subtrak be scaled to fit the size and growth of my construction company? Absolutely! Subtrak is designed to grow with you by providing a scalable knowledge base, training platform, and SOP documentation system, supporting your business at every stage. column4: In today’s fast-paced business climate, companies need to access a mind-boggling number of apps to effectively manage their service-based or consulting businesses online. For example, they might use Zoom for video conferencing, Calendly for scheduling, Excel for accounting, PayPal for billing, a landing page or a CMS to promote the service, and the list goes on. Many of these tools are scattered everywhere! Navigating all these tools is time consuming and confusing for both the service provider and the client. Helppo SaaS is a B2B SaaS provider that has unique features that allow businesses to create their own websites tailored to their clients and administrative needs, have a strong digital presence, save money, enhance productivity, and improve user experience. Helppo SaaS offers a scheduling system with an automated waitlist function to fill canceled appointments. Multi-person meetings can be easily scheduled using our interactive availability calendar. Users will be able to seamlessly sync Google Calendar with our scheduling system. Additionally, we offer a video conferencing feature with an online whiteboard, text editing software, and a payment system integrated with a time tracker. This time tracker is one of our greatest differentiators because it automates billing. The system automatically creates and sends invoices, allowing businesses to focus on their own work instead of time-consuming clerical tasks. We also have: -a FAQ auto reply and live messenger feature, -a learning and content management system, -a multilanguage user interface, and -productivity analytics tool to assess client and provider engagement At Helppo, we believe the whole is greater than the sum of its parts. Here at Helppo, an expert is just a few clicks away!

column6: AiNa Doctor AI Dentistry Service For Dental Clinics and Patients AiNaDoctor provides cloud artificial intelligence solutions and products for dentistry Get started Learn more Our Partners What is cloud AI solution? The ultimate solution that bridges clinics and patients . Dental Revolution Cloud AI solutions are transforming the field of dentistry, making it easier, faster, and more convenient for both clinics and patients. Privacy Protection Protect the confidentiality of patients' data and prevent unauthorized access or leakage. Efficiency Enhancement Automate and simplify complex tasks that require manual labor and expertise, such as crown and bridge design, surgical guide creation, and occlusion analysis. Communication Improvement Enhance the communication between you and your patients, as well as between you and the dental labs. Innovative Access Enable you to access the latest technology and research in the field of dentistry, without having to invest in expensive equipment or software. Focus on what matters in dental practice Focus on what matters in dental practice As a dentist or an oral health professional, you know how important it is to provide the best care possible to your patients. You also know how challenging it can be to manage the various aspects of your dental practice, such as diagnosis, treatment planning, communication, and administration. That's why AiNaDoctor is here to help you. AiNaDoctor is a cloud artificial intelligence solution that offers state-of-the-art digital dental technologies, which not only simplify your workflow but also significantly improve your communication efficiency with your patients and dental laboratories. Start Managing your Clinics Easier Contact US Frequently Asqued Questions You can find answers to some of the most common questions about our products, services, features, benefits, and more. AiNaDoctor is a company that provides cloud artificial intelligence solutions and products for dentistry. We aim to enhance the daily practices of dentists and oral health professionals by offering state-of-the-art digital dental technologies. AiNaDoctor works by using artificial intelligence (AI) to perform tasks or provide insights through cloud computing platforms. Our products use AI to simplify complex tasks such as diagnosis, treatment design, and prognosis, as well as automate the generation of dental crowns and surgical guides. Our products also use AI to create virtual 4D patients, customized digital facebows and articulators, and visualize treatment outcomes. AiNaDoctor is very accurate and precise. We use state-of-the-art AI technology to perform complex tasks that require expertise and precision. We also use high-quality data sources and algorithms to ensure the validity and reliability of our results. We constantly update and improve our products and services based on feedback and research. Dental clinics need cloud AI solution because it can help them improve their workflow, communication, and treatment outcomes. Cloud AI solution can simplify complex tasks such as diagnosis, treatment design, and prognosis, as well as automate the generation of dental crowns and surgical guides. Cloud AI solution can also enhance the communication efficiency between dentists, patients, and dental laboratories by creating virtual 4D patients, customized digital facebows and articulators, and visualizing treatment outcomes. Cloud AI solution can also reduce the cost and time of dental practice by eliminating the need for expensive equipment and minimizing administrative expenses. AiNaDoctor is compatible with most dental software or hardware that support standard formats such as STL, OBJ, DICOM, JPEG, PNG, etc. You can easily import or export data from or to other dental software or hardware using our cloud service tools. You can also integrate our products with other dental software or hardware using our API.

Hunter Shaw Founder, Exotics Hunter CleanBooks has helped me keep my Quickbooks up to date, allowing me to focus on sales and growth. Their attention to detail is second to none. I highly recommend them . Gavin Perrett Founder, Penfold Golf USA I can't recommend CleanBooks enough for lean companies like mine. They help us with our modeling, projections, dashboards, and monthly reconciliations. Our books are clean , reports are accurate, and our small team is much more efficient. Geordan Mandell VP Operations & Finance, Viewpoint CleanBooks carefully analyzed the accounting needs of our business and helped us implement the systems we really needed. Critical reports are now accurate and always at our fingertips. Kapila Chase VP of Operations, Design Miami Can't recommend highly enough. Our finances and systems are running smoothly and I can spend my time on the business . Thank you!! ‍ Nicole Darnell CEO, Zymurgy Send a Message Ask us about a complimentary review of your books. Whether you decide to work with us or not, we will give you a detailed roadmap that you or your team can use to clean your books. Email us at hello@cleanbooks.ai or fill out this form. Thank you! Your submission has been received! Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form. Frequently Asked Questions What size companies do you work with? Our clients typically generate annual revenues ranging from 1 million to 50 million. Businesses of this size often operate without a large finance team, or any finance team at all. However, having clean books, tracking the correct KPIs, and automating manual tasks are still critical to growing the business. What industries do you work with? We have worked with car dealerships, e-commerce brands, art fairs, design galleries, therapy practices, VC funds (the GP), and more. Our core principals of clean books and world-class finance operations apply to companies across all industries. What kind of financial reports do you provide? After reconciling your books each month, we provide standard financial statements including an updated P&L, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow Statement. We also collaborate with your team to develop and maintain custom reports. Examples of these include financial forecasts, dashboards highlighting critical KPIs, cash flow reports with runway analysis, and P&L breakdown by deal, among others. How much does this cost? Every business has unique needs. Some ask us to simply review their bookkeeper's work. Some require forecasting and monthly reconciliation. Others ask us to bring a team and become their finance function. Our services typically start at $1,000 per month. Please contact us to discuss your specific needs. What accounting solutions do you work with? At this time we only work with Quickbooks. How do you leverage automation in your bookkeeping services? Manual, repetitive tasks tend to have higher error rates and are costly because that time can be used more efficiently. We believe in automating as many manual tasks as possible. Some examples include invoices that are created in Quickbooks and sent to customers, processing bills due to vendors & contractors, assigning the best clients to the best salespeople, pulling KPIs from various sources into a Dashboard, and many others. Services Price Contact Us Testimonial FAQ

Learn More Connect & unlock your data​ Swiftly build a detailed map of your data world with our AI engine, showcasing all the important relationships. Explore hidden insights​ Gain a fresh perspective on your information as our AI unveils insightful relationships, adding depth and breadth to your understanding. Ask better questions Chat naturally with our AI chatbot, Izzy, to improve how you ask questions and get smarter, context-based answers from your information. Empower your teams​ Work seamlessly with your team by sharing data insights and creating tasks, all within the Workbench.​ Graph technology can serve as a Symantec search layer by enhancing the search capabilities with graph-based algorithms and data structures Here’s how it can be implemented: Data Indexing Graph databases can index not only the data itself but also the relationships between data points. When a user performs a search query, the graph database can quickly traverse the graph to locate relevant data points based on their relationships, significantly speeding up the search process compared to traditional search engines. Learn More Semantic Search Graph technology enables semantic search, allowing users to find information based on the meaning and context of their query rather than just keyword matching. By understanding the relationships between different data elements, the search layer can provide more accurate and relevant results to users. Learn More Contextual Understanding Graph databases excel at capturing contextual information, which is crucial for effective search. By modeling relationships between different entities, the search layer can take into account the context in which data points exist, leading to more precise search results. Learn More Relationship-based Ranking In addition to keyword relevance, graph-based search engines can rank search results based on the strength and relevance of the relationships between data points. This helps prioritize the most relevant information for the user, improving the overall search experience. Learn More Faceted Search Graph databases support faceted search, allowing users to refine their search results based on various attributes and relationships. Users can navigate through different facets of the data to drill down to the most relevant information, making it easier to find what they’re looking for. Learn More Graph Analytics Beyond simple keyword search, graph technology enables advanced analytics on the data graph. Users can perform complex graph queries and algorithms to uncover patterns, detect anomalies, and derive insights from the data, providing a deeper understanding of the information landscape. Learn More Real-time Search With the ability to traverse relationships quickly, graph-based search layers can support real-time or near-real-time search queries. This is especially beneficial in dynamic environments where data is constantly changing, allowing users to access the most up-to-date information. Learn More Integration with Existing Systems Graph search layers can integrate with existing Symantec systems and data sources, providing a unified interface for searching across disparate data silos. This enables organizations to leverage their existing investments in Symantec products while enhancing search capabilities with graph technology. BenchSights re-imagines how businesses can implement and use benchmarking to grow their businesses. BenchSights fonder & CEO, David Spitz built the Pacific Crest/KeyBanc SaaS Survey, over a twelve-year period, and learned firsthand the power of benchmarking. Pacific Crest was amply rewarded, participating in virtually every SaaS IPO in those early years. David also realized that traditional benchmarking is painful! It has all the telltale signs of a business opportunity: manual processes, ill-suited survey tools, spreadsheets, static reports, etc. With BenchSights, we have created a new software and data platform which fixes, automates, and redefines how benchmarking works, creating significant value for our partners and customers and the industries they serve. David Skok General Partner, Matrix Partners We’ve been partners with David for over 10 years, helping to establish the Pacific Crest (now KBCM) SaaS Survey as one of the most valuable benchmarking resources in the SaaS industry. We're excited to partner with BenchSights – a natural follow-on to the SaaS Survey. Industry Trusted Trusted by a wide variety of partners and active investors in the SaaS ecosystem. Built from Years of Experience in SaaS David Spitz, Founder & CEO of BenchSights David brings over 30 years of software investment banking expertise to BenchSights, having previously led the Software practice at KeyBanc Capital Markets (formerly Pacific Crest Securities). His transaction leadership spans the SaaS industry’s most influential companies, including Salesforce, ServiceNow, Workday, Veeva, HubSpot, Twilio, Zoom, and dozens of other market leaders. Beyond transactions, David has been a SaaS industry pioneer since its earliest days. In 2006, he established the investment banking sector’s first SaaS-focused conferences, and in 2010, created the industry’s first annual SaaS benchmarking reports—laying the groundwork for his future vision. In 2021, David founded BenchSights to revolutionize how companies approach benchmarking through purpose-built software and data solutions. The company serves clients like Gainsight and Winning by Design, and recently launched its flagship SaaS Metrics application in 2025. David holds three degrees from MIT: a BS in Computer Science, an MS in Operations Research, and an MBA from Sloan. 2025 BenchSights LLC Terms Privacy Go to Top

column4: A San Francisco-based startup building large-scale, regional AI models for pest management in partnership with leading universities, industrial boards, agricultural businesses and technology firms.
column6: Bloomag, Inc. We know Tech. You know Agriculture. Together we create Insights. Creating a better world through technology ABOUT US Creating a better world through technology A San Francisco-based startup building large-scale, regional Artificial Intelligence models for pest management in partnership with leading universities, industrial boards, agricultural businesses and technology firms. Mission Bloomag is an Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning business, developing innovative solutions for agricultural industry. With a global presence, we are operating in the US and beyond. Our advanced technology helps significantly reduce pesticide use, leading to a healthier environment and safer products for all. Values We value transparency, and data protection. This is reflected in our public governance rules, which allow users to stay informed and participate in decision-making processes. We give our users control over their personal information, allowing them to make their data public or private. Strategy A globally aware, locally relevant early warning Business Intelligence system for agriculture that will that will integrate both public and private siloed data sets to provide insights to the industry. Made to reduce the use of agriculture inputs whilst increasing yields and reducing unnecessary waste. Team Our team boasts a diverse range of skills and knowledge in engineering, agronomy, Artificial Intelligence, and business. With a unique blend of international industry expertise. TECHNOLOGY The Intersection of Technology and Agriculture Emerging technologies in agriculture rely on real-time data to optimize crop health, agronomic practices, and predict pest/disease outbreaks and natural disasters. Predictive models using various data types provide personalized recommendations to farmers on crop growth and fertilizer/pesticide use. Technology Agnostic Data Collection We are able to work with any format of data, which allows us to gather a wide range of information. Data Storage An important aspect of data storage is data security, to keep the data safe from unauthorised access or breaches Data Cleaning Working closely with our clients to understand their specific needs and implement a data cleaning plan that is tailored to their needs. Data Enhancement Enriching data to develop predictive models, and to help increase productivity DIGITAL AGRICULTURE Bloomag optimizes Digital Agriculture data flow Image: World Bank | “Schroeder, Kateryna; Lampietti, Julian; Elabed, Ghada. 2021. What's Cooking : Digital Transformation of the Agrifood System. Agriculture and Food Series;. Washington, DC: World Bank. © World Bank.https://openknowledge.worldbank.org/handle/10986 /35216 License: CC BY 3.0 IGO.” Data Protection Secure We prioritise data security and privacy. All of our datasets are encrypted and only data account holders have access to their individual data. You always own your data. Transparent We value transparency, accountability, and data protection. This is reflected in our public governance rules, which allow users to stay informed and participate in decision-making processes. Open Source Bloomag’s platform is based on open source software developed with our partners. Credible We understand that trust is an important factor when choosing a service provider. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is available by email at info@bloomag.com and we are always happy to help. Made for your team Send us a message! info@bloomag.com BLOOMAG CONSORTIUM We form part of a consortium. Join us to drive progress and innovation in agriculture. Data is a powerful tool for driving innovation and progress in the agricultural industry. By working together and leveraging the relationships that already exist, we can drive positive change and benefit the entire industry. Our collaborative business model is based on trust and the belief that we are stronger together. Learn More Copyright © 2023 Bloomag, Inc. | Privacy Policy | Cookie Policy | Terms of Service

column4: RealtyX offers a digitized subscriptions and communications platform linked with a secondary market to match buyers with sellers of private real estate interests.
column6: Home - RealtyX RealtyX is a secure digital platform improving the entire transaction process for private real estate funds. RealtyX offers a digitized subscriptions and communications platform linked with a secondary market to match buyers with sellers of private real estate interests. How it Works? Fully integrated with service provider systems Our mission is to improve the client experience from the first touch to final distribution by offering seamless technology and a deep pool of buyers and sellers of private real estate interests. To learn more contact us . BUY Easily find investment opportunities Sell Find and negotiate with buyers Finance Financing available through platform A New Platform RealtyX is investing in building advanced technology for the private real estate interest asset class as well as bringing deep experience finding liquidity in illiquid markets. Our secure digital platform offers: Improved Op margins and reduced error rate Private, permissioned blockchain which means improved security, privacy and data control A modular and configurable platform which integrates with existing systems A Better Investor Experience From First Investment To Final Distribution Accelerate time to AUM Accelerate investor onboarding & follow-on capital Reduce Manual Work Digitize paper-intensive processes Attract new LPs Differentiate the LP experience with a digital-first platform Partners RealtyX is the first real estate platform built as a collaboration between three key partners: Hedgebay Securities LLC A FINRA-registered broker specializing in secondary liquidity Multi-billion dollar real estate investment firm Triple Point Inc. A fintech company developing and using permissioned blockchain Leadership Brian Charlebois joined Realtyx in 2024 as Vice President of Special Situations. Brian brings over 25 years of experience in banking and finance with a particular emphasis on deal making, capital markets, operational turnarounds, and structured product development. Prior to joining Realtyx, Brian was EVP and COO at First International Bank, Managing Director at Icon International and Green Hill Financial. He also served as Special Assets Team Lead at First Niagara Bank and Head of C & I Banking at Bankwell Bank. Brian Charlebois Vice President of Special Situations Andrew Kurian (CRCP) joined RealtyX in 2021 as the Firms Fin-op CFO and Chief Compliance Officer and was promoted to President in April of 2023. Andrew was recently appointed to the North Region committee advising FINRA, is a FINRA arbitrator and brings over 25 years experience in the securities business, the past 9 as CFO/CCO of Hedgebay Securities where he is dually registered. Andrew has traded on the floors of the NYSE and the Deutsche Borse in Frankfurt, Germany where he was instrumental in introducing and developing electronic arbitrage trading platforms. Andrew Kurian President Puneet Chadha joined RealtyX in April of 2022 as the firm’s Head of Operations. He brings over 15 years’ of experience in operations, including roles at Bank of America, Merrill Lynch, GE Capital, Citi Private Bank, and Man Group. Puneet Chadha Operations Patrick Stiefel joined RealtyX in 2023 as the Global Head of Business Development. Patrick brings over 25 years of experience in the securities industry including his current role at Hedgebay Securities where he is dually registered. Notably, Patrick has played a pivotal role in establishing thriving equity derivative and structured products franchises across major financial hubs, including Frankfurt, London, and New York, during the earlier phases of his career. Patrick Stiefel Global Head of Business Development Robert Alex Jr. is the Vice President of RealtyX, focusing on liquidity, fund raising, and financing solutions for private real estate interests of all types. Robert's past experience includes that of analyst, senior analyst, and leadership at various institutional real estate firms dating back to 2013, focusing on debt and equity solutions across sectors. Robert Alex Jr. VP, Real Estate Brian Charlebois joined Realtyx in 2024 as Vice President of Special Situations. Brian brings over 25 years of experience in banking and finance with a particular emphasis on deal making, capital markets, operational turnarounds, and structured product development. Prior to joining Realtyx, Brian was EVP and COO at First International Bank, Managing Director at Icon International and Green Hill Financial. He also served as Special Assets Team Lead at First Niagara Bank and Head of C & I Banking at Bankwell Bank. Brian Charlebois Vice President of Special Situations Andrew Kurian (CRCP) joined RealtyX in 2021 as the Firms Fin-op CFO and Chief Compliance Officer and was promoted to President in April of 2023. Andrew was recently appointed to the North Region committee advising FINRA, is a FINRA arbitrator and brings over 25 years experience in the securities business, the past 9 as CFO/CCO of Hedgebay Securities where he is dually registered. Andrew has traded on the floors of the NYSE and the Deutsche Borse in Frankfurt, Germany where he was instrumental in introducing and developing electronic arbitrage trading platforms. column6: managedorg.com | 522: Connection timed out Connection timed out Error code 522 Visit cloudflare.com for more information. 2024-10-15 01:12:51 UTC You Browser Working Madrid Cloudflare Working managedorg.com Host Error What happened? The initial connection between Cloudflare's network and the origin web server timed out. As a result, the web page can not be displayed. What can I do? If you're a visitor of this website: Please try again in a few minutes. If you're the owner of this website: Contact your hosting provider letting them know your web server is not completing requests. An Error 522 means that the request was able to connect to your web server, but that the request didn't finish. The most likely cause is that something on your server is hogging resources. Additional troubleshooting information here. Cloudflare Ray ID: 8d2bf084ba91cbc2 • Your IP: 185.10.7.230 • Performance & security by Cloudflare

column4: A public benefit corporation that builds software for foundations and nonprofits. The company also offers grant writing services for nonprofits to apply through its platform and directly to funders not yet associated with Impact Match. Impact Match values collaboration and designs its products and services with foundation and nonprofit representatives, who have been integral to the existing platform.

column4: SageGreenLife® by SmartBiotiles™ is a ClimateTech company. Our innovative, data-rich solutions empower commercial real estate owners, operators, and occupants to address the ESG and sustainability challenges of their built environments. We have the smartest living walls for our planet. Founded in Chicago in 2010 by Richard Kincaid, the 25-years visionary Equity Office CEO, the company embarked on a mission to bring sustainability to its deep commercial real estate roots. Powered by its global IP portfolio, SageGreenLife® established itself as the premiere sustainable built environment provider with marquee real estate owners and Fortue-500 customers. Its proprietary Biotiles® ConstructionTech, and MediaWall™ AdTech solutions have been deployed in thousands of projects globally and sold under the Biotecture brand in the UK. In 2020 SageGreenlife® was restructured and relaunched in 2022 under new ownership by Silicon Valley technology veterans under the SageGreenLife® by SmartBiotiles™ brand. Today the company SmartWalls™ offer a new generation of future-proof solutions that propel the best sustainable built environments.

column4: Owl Health&Care, a business unit of ValueMomentum, is focused on digital transformation for Senior Living, Long-Term Care, Health Payer, PBM and Life Sciences industries. We serve over 100 enterprise clients — including a renowned aging services organization, many health payers and PBM. Equipped with and backed by more than 20 years of providing software and expertise, Owl Health&Care anticipates clients’ needs and innovates relentlessly. Our solutions help our customers simplify operations and accelerate innovation by leveraging technology solutions and platforms requiring low capital investments. Our cloud solutions and enterprise class services focus on realizing key objectives like growing business, growing partnerships, scaling efficiently, and operating digitally. Owl Health&Care’s ready-to-go cloud-native technology solutions and services can be leveraged by senior living communities to - Engage staff, residents, and family digitally; automate tasks, work, and content; connect data and leverage insights through analytics; integrate with partners and systems; and manage IT and application assets effectively and efficiently. Our cloud-based solutions help senior living communities achieve their strategic business objectives, viz., engagement, improved quality of care, operational efficiency, enhanced productivity, and accelerated innovation. We help senior care communities connect and collaborate across the ecosystem to optimize outcomes and successfully manage risk. Our innovative solutions help build healthy, thriving, successful and efficient senior communities. We help all our clients scale processes, improve collaboration for growth, harness the power of data analytics, and achieve better outcomes. Let Owl Health&Care help you realize the benefits of digital transformation in your community.

Read more Years in Business 0 + Enterprises Served 0 + Member Tech Team 0 + Trusted by the World's Best Companies What Our Customers Are Saying The challenge for LTPAC is not in obtaining data. The information is already out there, available from hundreds of data sources. The true value is in bringing it together and using it to generate real-world, actionable insights that are accessible to more than just the data experts in providing quality care, improving resident/family experience and helping scale operations. This can be accomplished in a scalable and efficient manner by leveraging a platform-based approach. James Dellapa Chief Information Officer, Parker Health Group We are very appreciative of Owlhealth’s commitment to this project and the high-quality models they built for us. These are exactly the tools we need to truly understand the current state of our business, and I look forward to seeing the predictive and prescriptive capabilities now underway. Edward Matthews Chief Financial Officer, Parker Health Group Contact OwlHealth&Care We appreciate your interest in OwlHealth&Care. WAE's technology feels different because it was built by people who've spent years solving the exact challenges we face every day.” — Stefani LiDestri, LiDestri Foods The Challenges You Face Navigating the Worker Reliability Crisis With 70% of businesses struggling to fill critical positions, traditional staffing methods are failing precisely when you need workforce reliability more than ever. Increased operational costs such as retraining Quality concerns Poor fill rates and lost market opportunities Increased overtime expenses High no show rates How WAE Can Help WAE Transforms Outdated Staffing Into a Real-Time, Data-Driven Experience. Before we were a technology company, we were a staffing agency. Success often meant filling orders fast, but it rarely delivered the results our customers deserved. We knew there had to be a better way — so we built it. Commitment: Workers pick shifts and manage their own schedules. Vendor Neutral: Option to Integrate with your existing staffing relationships. Recruitment: Talent pool grows every day with the most reliable workers. Dependable Talent Matching Our transparent scoring algorithm tracks attendance patterns to connect you with the most reliable talent available. Fewer no-shows. Fewer cancellations. Public scoring motivates better performance. Invite top performers for future shifts or permanent roles. Powerfully Simple Technology Cut staffing management and effort by 67% with practical technology that streamlines everything from posting jobs to managing attendance. Fill shifts automatically or handpick workers you trust. Post jobs and watch them fill instantly. Geo-fenced clock-in-and-out feature to prevent time theft. Build talent pool for permanent hires. For the first time, you can find under one single proprietary cloud-based software platform everything you need: (1) CMS-Content Management System, (2) OMS-Order Management System, (3) Seller Center (multi-merchant and multi-warehouse/multi-store), (4) front-end, (5) back-end, as well as multiple API integrations: (6) payments (including loyalty points currency), (7) last mile delivery/fulfillment centers, (8) ERPs/ecommerce, and (9) WMS-Warehouse Management System., allowing you to have a seamless integrated process working alongside with only one Technology Partner rather than multiple technology providers. Whether you are a startup, a small and medium-sized business (SMB), a brand, a retailer, a distributor, or a large corporation in any industry and any country, whether you're interested in a direct-to-consumer (DTC), business-to-consumer (B2C), business-to-business (B2B), or B2B2C business model platform, we will help you launch fast (2 to 4 months) and scale your business with the latest marketplace technology in the most cost-efficient way. According to MITSloan, (marketplace) platform companies were 2X as profitable, were growing 2X as fast, and were more than 2X as valuable as their conventional counterparts. According to research firm Forrester, 63% of U.S. ecommerce is performed via marketplaces. Now you can easily launch a marketplace or convert you ecommerce into a marketplace with niew, allowing you to increase significantly your assortment and selection (via marketplace dropship) and in turn, increase your Conversion Rate and Sales, increasing your company's value and customer retention. We are builders, and will help you build personalized platforms (in English or Spanish) as your Technology Partner to make your business reach its full potential!

column4: Our mission is to automate grunt work and reduce manual processes at your business so you and your employees can focus on higher-value tasks. column6: Grunt Automate | Automate Grunt Work top of page Automate Grunt Work, Focus on Growth Automate Grunt Work, Focus on Growth Automate Grunt Work, Focus on Growth Pipeline Automation | Chat Bot Development | Workflow Automation Schedule Free Consultation OUR SERVICES Pipeline Automation Chat Bot Development Workflow Automation We automate your sales and marketing pipelines to nurture leads, qualify prospects, and convert more customers without extensive manual work. Our pipeline automation services utilize the latest in AI and machine learning to optimize your funnels. Our pipeline automation solutions combine the versatility of AI with the institutional knowledge of your organization to create living, breathing and constantly innovating sales engines that run 24/7 to turn strangers into delighted customers. We take a holistic approach - mapping your end-to-end processes first before automating repetitive tasks within the workflows. This allows the automation to scale across your business without redundancy or inefficiency. Our team analyzes procedures you're following manually, no matter how complex, like: Data entry across multiple systems Transferring customer order details for fulfillment Updating product inventories across warehouses Scheduling sales appointments in CRMs Collecting new hire paperwork and creating employee records These mundane, repetitive tasks offer little business value yet consume employee time. We build our intelligent chatbots on generative AI foundations like ChatGPT, fine-tuning the architectures for accurate, customized responses. But we go further - continuously training the models on actual conversational data from your customers to dynamically improve relevancy. ​ Current large language models still have challenges like restricted external data access. Our chatbots overcome such issues through tight integrations with our clients’ knowledge bases and backend systems to offer unified, omnichannel experiences. ​ We strategically complement human agents by automatically suggesting responses to them via cutting-edge generative AI. Agents can then easily edit or override suggestions before sending to customers, saving time while retaining control. Read More SERVICES Speed to Execution Rapid prototyping allows us to go from concept to working software in days or weeks rather than months. Our agile processes enable quick iterations and pivots as needed. With extensive experience automating complex processes, we’re able to quickly understand requirements, design optimal solutions, and start building right away. Speed is baked into our DNA. Coevos is dedicated to providing AI-powered intelligent laboratory products, aiding scientific exploration and progress. Centered on customer needs and driven by research and innovation, the company is dedicated to providing intelligent laboratory products through digital empowerment, aiding scientific exploration and progress. Recording every drop and exploring the future - The company leverages intelligent manufacturing technology, starting with the COEVOS intelligent digital pipetting system, striving to become a provider of fully integrated laboratory products with digital control and smart management. It is committed to becoming a provider of fully standardized laboratory services with controlled quality and traceable processes.
column6: Home_Coevos Technology Co., Ltd COEVOS Intelligent Digital Pipetting System Learn More Apply for Trial About Us Coevos Technology is rooted in the field of life sciences. Centered on customer needs and driven by research and innovation, the company is dedicated to providing intelligent laboratory products through digital empowerment, aiding scientific exploration and progress. Recording every drop, exploring the future -- Starting with the COEVOS intelligent digital pipetting system, the company leverages intelligent manufacturing technology, striving to become a provider of fully integrated laboratory products with digital control and intelligent management. It is committed to becoming a provider of fully standardized laboratory services with controlled quality and traceable processes. COEVOS Intelligent Digital Pipetting System The COEVOS Intelligent Digital Pipetting System is composed of the Intelligent Digital Pipette (IDP), Intelligent Charging Stand (ICS), Intelligent Experiment Assistant (IEA), and PTP Pipetting Recording Platform. It employs the innovative Co-AICal Intelligent Calibration Technology and Co-Link Industrial Connectivity Technology, which can record pipetting information in real-time, accurately trace the experimental process, highly replicate experimental details, and ensure the reproducibility of results. Additionally, it can send calibration service reminders and provide remote calibration services to customers, making it suitable for strictly managed laboratories. Closed Loop of Pipetting Record Real-time recording of the entire pipetting process during the experiment makes it easier to summarize and replicate experiments. Full Featured Trial – No Credit Card Required – Free Version Forever Personal & Team Task Management That's Faster, Easier, and More Affordable Eliminate The Chaos of Bloated & Confusing Tools and Endless Priorities  Effortless Task Creation Create tasks swiftly with our user-friendly interface, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.  Seamless Task Delegation Delegate tasks with ease and keep your team aligned and productive.  Organized Task Management Group and categorize tasks for efficient prioritization and management.  Integrated Calendar View Visualize your schedule with our calendar integration, making planning a breeze. g Customizable Settings Tailor your task management experience with flexible settings and preferences.  Mobile Synchronization Stay connected and manage tasks on the go with our mobile app synchronization.  Voice-Activated Task Creation Use voice commands to create tasks, enhancing convenience and efficiency.  Advanced Planning Tools Utilize hierarchical views and routines for comprehensive task planning. Your Ultimate Productivity Companion My Today Centralized hub for daily activities Talk To Task Verbally create tasks with AI assistance Plan Viewer Visual planner for tasks, projects, & goals TepinTasks Mobile with Talk-To-Task ™ Ai Harness the power of TepinTasks’ comprehensive task management on-the-go from your favorite device with the TepinTasks mobile companion apps. Get the edge by using the AI powered ‘Talk To Task’ voice recording feature for quick task creation and delegation. Use your voice to generate tasks, record your thoughts for later, make a list, schedule a meeting, or delegate a task to someone right at your fingertips. Your to-do list won't be cumbersome, overwhelming, and hard to use anymore. Now everything you need to organize and do is always within reach, always accessible. TepinTasks mobile apps help you get more done in one place and compliments our full featured Web App by allowing you to be totally mobile, create, delegate, and assign tasks from the convenience of your favorite mobile device. Download and get started for Free today. How much does it cost? TepinTasks is designed to be extremely affordable with a version that is Free with limited capacity use, or higher capacity versions for either $8 or $15. Additional custom licensing options will be available for larger Enterprises and special use cases needed for specific verticals. How do I start with TepinTasks? Everyone starts with a Free full featured 14 Day Trail. Sign-up now here . Do I install the software? TepinTasks is web based software that you run from any computer using your favorite browser by logging in here , or by downloading and installing our iOS or Android app(s) from your mobile device. Does my personal calendar show up on my business calendar? You can enable Google and Office 365 calendars to sync 1-way or bi-directionally with each Group in TepinTasks. Each sync'd calendar can be viewed separately or along with all other sync'd or non-sync'd calendars so you can always know what’s coming up next in your schedule. What integrations are available through TepinTasks? TepinTasks integrates with Google & Office 365 calendars but more integrations are in various stages of planning, design, and active development for QuickBooks, HubSpot, ConnectWise Manage, & Datto PSA (Autotask), Smartsheet, Jira, as well as 30+ other integrations. If there are specific integrations that you would like for TepinTasks to have please email us at info@tepintasks.com to give us the details of what you think would be helpful. How do I delegate tasks? Simply edit a task and assign it to a person. The person will be notified, and you will be able to see that the delegation request was sent, received, viewed, and accepted. Can I see the person accept my task? Yes. You will have full visibility to the status of the delegated task. You will be able to see that the delegation request was sent, received, viewed, and accepted (or rejected). How can I track what I delegate? You can set to receive notifications when the status of a delegated task has been changed or you can see the status in the “All Tasks” view or by looking at the task individually. column4: Imagine, Create, and Launch Full-Stack Cloud Apps using AI and No-Code! At the heart of Zingy’s platform lies the AI-enhanced editor, a user-friendly tool equipped with drag-and-drop capabilities for effortlessly crafting pages and forms. But the innovation doesn’t stop there. With the introduction of Zingy’s AI Wiz feature, users can now design interfaces by merely describing their requirements in plain English. This language-driven approach heralds the future of application development, making it more accessible and intuitive than ever before. One of the standout attributes of Zingy’s no-code platform is its versatility. Businesses across various sectors can leverage the platform to design tailor-made applications that address specific challenges and requirements. Whether it’s a custom dashboard for monitoring finance or sales, a sophisticated management app for IoT devices, a dedicated customer support portal, or an internal automation tool to streamline company processes, Zingy has got it covered. Its adaptability ensures that organizations, regardless of their size or industry, can create solutions that align perfectly with their objectives, enhancing efficiency and ensuring a competitive edge. With the revolutionary “Page Flow” feature, a block-based approach, users can effortlessly construct intricate programs by stacking and connecting pre-designed blocks. These blocks encapsulate specific programming concepts, enabling the creation of complex solutions without writing a single line of code. Furthermore, “Cloud Flow” supercharges apps with custom cloud logic, background tasks, and secure web-hook integrations, ensuring seamless harmony with external applications. This flexibility reduces reliance on technical experts while guaranteeing robust security and interoperability. Those keen to explore the platform can check out the live demo, showcasing the myriad of features Zingy brings to the table.

column4: Ceres WMS offers an inventory and workflow management system tailored for B2B manufacturers, co-packers, machine shops, and fabricators. Originally developed for the food manufacturing industry, where the platform has been in use for over a decade, our platform boosts efficiency and accuracy in warehouse and inventory processes. Ceres incorporates comprehensive tools for inventory control, order processing, workflow automation, and production scheduling. Additionally, while the system comes with an extensive range of features upon initial implementation, it can also be customized for situations that demand more complex reporting and control capabilities. With features like integrated Bill of Materials (BOM), order processing, and workflow automation, we help businesses manage their operations smoothly. Our mission is to optimize warehouse management, offering reliable and effective solutions to meet the unique needs of our clients. Learn more about our features and how we can support your business at CeresWMS.com
column6: Ceres WMS | Streamlined Warehouse & Production Management Software top of page Warehouse Management Order Processing Production Scheduling Ceres WMS is designed for small to mid-sized manufacturing businesses, co-packers, fabrication shops, and machine shops that need a powerful yet simple solution for managing inventory, orders, and production. Designed by users for users, our platform is tailored to meet real-world operational needs with intuitive functionality and seamless integration. By integrating Order Management (OMS), Warehouse Management (WMS), and Production Scheduling System (PSS), we provide a seamless platform that optimizes your operations from order to delivery. Warehouse Management Our Warehouse Management System (WMS) optimizes inventory tracking , order fulfillment , and workflow automation , enhancing efficiency at every stage. With real-time stock visibility , barcode scanning , and seamless multi-location support, Ceres minimizes errors, accelerates operations, and keeps your warehouse running smoothly. Order Processing Our integrated ordering , workflow , and approval system provides streamlined order tracking and management, ensuring every order moves efficiently through each stage of the process. By automating approvals and identifying potential bottlenecks in real time, Ceres WMS helps you maintain smooth operations, reduce delays , and improve overall order accuracy and fulfillment speed . Production Scheduling Our Production Scheduling System (PSS), integrated with Bill of Materials (BOM) functionality, optimizes resource allocation , workflow coordination, and production planning . Ceres WMS ensures smooth operations with real-time scheduling and order prioritization, while BOM integration prevents inventory shortages and delays. Get Started Today If you are looking to streamline your warehouse and inventory processes, then contact us today to find out how we can help you. Contact Us Demo bottom of page

Why leaders choose iForels? We empower knowledge workers with a disproportionate advantage by replacing 12+ legacy apps with a single synchronized database, built-in AI, and flexible enterprise-level interfaces. Design business tools in minutes iForels DB is the AI layer that automatically optimizes infrastructure built on Apache technologies. It’s designed from scratch to aggregate extremely high-volume datasets with minimal downtime and maximum reliability. Hundreds of AI models at your fingerprint Your data is your advantage! Train unlimited AI models using the best AI frameworks without development time. Just click, and your own AI is cleaned, labeled, trained, deployed, and ready to use. Connect every part of your business Save days for synchronization with the iForels connector. From tabular data in spreadsheets or SQL to IoT and devices – iForels will synchronize data and activate powerful automation in minutes. Use powerful interfaces from the box iForels Views and Automations transform your AI-driven database into limitless collaboration tools for teams and leaders of all sizes. From powerful infrastructure to advanced business solutions — we’ve got you covered! Sorry, your browser doesn't support embedded videos. Imagine you get AI-ready apps 10× Faster Get A Try 24/7 Live Support. On-demand certified partners’ assistance. Unleash Your Operational Powerhouse Transform your legacy software, spreadsheets, and files into a powerful operation system! Our experts guide you through a proven process, ensuring your success. Start 14-day trial Request a demo Pre-built apps by industries Dedicated 24/7 support iForels is an AI and data automation platform that provides a suite of tools for businesses to build custom operational systems without any development time. It allows enterprises to transform legacy software, spreadsheets, and files into a robust operational system, with experts guiding you through the process. The platform offers a high-speed database, iForels DB, that automatically uses AI to optimize infrastructure built on Apache technologies. This infrastructure is designed to aggregate extremely high-volume datasets with minimal downtime and maximum reliability. Users can train unlimited AI models using the best AI frameworks without any development time​. iForels also provides powerful interfaces that transform your AI-driven database into limitless collaboration tools for teams and leaders of all sizes. It also enables the synchronization of workflows, allowing you to save time on synchronization with the iForels connector, which can handle everything from tabular data in spreadsheets or SQL to IoT devices. iForels will synchronize data and activate powerful automation in minutes. The platform utilizes all available AI technologies and provides guardrails to protect against hallucinated answers or forecasts. It also has a visual interface that allows non-technical people to set up the database, generate views, and train AI models. iForels has a triggers-actions configuration for each feature/column or a specific condition. iForels is a cloud-hosting solution that charges clients based on usage, not by users. The billing system is tailored to the client’s particular needs based on their required resource allocation. The platform also provides an open-source SDK for developers who wish to build custom mobile or web applications while utilizing a robust dashboard with real-time AI-driven predictions. There is no specific limit for your database in iForels. Their AI automatically manages the secure database and aggregations distribution. If you need a high-load environment configuration for petabytes of data, they provide 24/7 live support and certified partners’ assistance. iForels’ importing tool can automatically recognize constants and other system variables, converting SQL datasets into an optimized format supported by the iForels Database engine​​. iForels has various integrations with large language models (LLMs), including OpenAI technology. For example, you can simultaneously generate Kanban tasks for all departments by setting triggers on the feature/column containing the meeting transcript. The AI will extract meaningful information from each team separately and create summarized tasks in their workspace. Lastly, iForels offers an Offline Extension for Chrome that allows users to search, read, update, and delete information they were working with online when they’re not connected to the internet. All changes will be uploaded to iForels once a stable internet connection appears. Users can also pre-download selected data and documents before they go offline to remain productive from anywhere​​. column6: Solargistix 0 Net Zero is the idea that a building or company can reduce the amount of carbon emissions they are responsible for in a way that still maintains optimal efficiency and results in the amount of carbon emissions being less than or equal to that of the amount of carbon they remove from the atmosphere through green energy production… …resulting in a Net Zero carbon emissions! Net Zero Learn more Charging as a Service Lower the barrier to entry on EV Charging by lowering the upfront cost. Trade overhead and capital expenses for a low, monthly subscription, which includes many benefits to get your positive cash flow up right away. Rather than paying all at once, offset the high cost with a monthly payment. Easily apply a recurring expense with scheduled payments that include a monthly maintenance service, eliminating high-cost spikes for emergency maintenance services. Keep overhead costs low by reducing miscellaneous costs (like network operations and driver support). Solargistix will provide these services for you. After each contract term, you can easily upgrade out-of-date stations as the industry continues to evolve. Learn about CaaS Digital Infrastructure There are a lot of moving parts that go into any green solution for home or business. A solar array embedded into a microgrid can supply sustainable and green energy to any building and is scalable to any size project. EV Chargers are gaining more traction as the electric vehicle industry continues to advance along with powerful software monitoring the status, maintenance, and power consumption/production of a system. All of it takes a lot of work… Solargistix has solutions to simplify and handle every aspect. Learn More Facts about Solar The price of a complete system is calculated from your cost per watt by the number of total watts in the projected system to run your building. Though every building is different, on average it takes about 10 watts to power a square foot of commercial space. The figure shown above is for a 10.25 kW system after repayment of capital. Free Estimate Contact Us Get a quote on your personal CaaS price or started on your new PV array. Reach out to our team today.

YoBulk is a highly beneficial tool for a variety of professionals, such as Developers, Product Managers, Customer Success teams, and Marketers. It simplifies the process of onboarding and verifying customer data, making it an indispensable asset for those who deal with frequent CSV data uploads to a system with a predetermined schema or template. This tool is particularly valuable for updating sales CRM or product catalog data, and it effectively solves the initial challenge of customer data ingestion. 1. Smart Spreadsheet View: Designed to be a data exchange hub for any business that utilizes CSV files, YoBulk makes it easy to import and transform any CSV into a smart spreadsheet interface. This user-friendly interface highlights errors in a clear, concise manner, simplifying the task of cleaning data. 2. Bring your validation function: YoBulk offers a platform for Developers to create a custom CSV importer that includes personalized validation rules based on JSON schema. With this functionality, developers can design an importer that meets their specific needs and preferences. 3. AI first : YoBulk harnesses the power of OpenAI to provide advanced column matching, data cleaning and JSON schema generation features. 4. Build for Scale: YoBulk is designed for large-scale CSV validation, with the ability to process files in the gigabyte range without any glitches or errors. 5. Embeddable: Take advantage of YoBulk's customizable import button feature, which can be embedded on any SaaS or App. This allows you to receive CSV data in the exact format you require, streamlining your workflows.
column6: OpenSource CSV importer YoBulk | YoBulk Skip to main content YoBulk GPT Integrated Customer Data Onboarding Platform Open Source Alternative to OneSchema,Osmos.io and flatfile.com Get Started Trusted by 250+ organizations worldwide Scalable<Power of Streams>💪 YoBulk is designed to scale. YoBulk is designed for large-scale CSV validation, with the ability to process files in the gigabyte range without any glitches or errors.Transformations are done on stream buffers while handling BACKPRESSURE & PACING gracefully. AI first<Power of GPT3>🚀🚀 YoBulk harnesses the power of OpenAI to provide advanced column matching, data cleaning and JSON schema generation features. Generate validation schemas in seconds using YoBulk AI. Simple <Smart Spreadsheet>😃 YoBulk Spreadsheet view for CSV error validation is simple yet very effective. Designed to be a data exchange hub for any business that utilizes CSV files, YoBulk makes it easy to import and transform any CSV into a smart spreadsheet interface. This user-friendly interface highlights errors in a clear, concise manner, simplifying the task of cleaning data. BYOD & BYOV <Bring your own database and validation rules>🙌 YoBulk offers a platform for Developers to create a custom CSV importer that includes personalized validation rules based on JSON schema. With this functionality, developers can design an importer that meets their specific needs and preferences.YoBulk will allow you to do all the data cleaning and onboarding in your own house without thinking much about DATA PRIVACY. YoBulk SDK 1 import { YoButton } from "yoembed" ; 2 import "./App.css" ; 3 4 function App ( ) { 5 return ( 6 < div className = "App" > 7 < h2 > SaaS Embeddable Button </ h2 > 8 < hr /> 9 < br /> 10 < YoButton 11 btnText = "Import CSV" 12 importerId = {id generated by the system for your importer } 13 yoHostUrl = { ' http: // localhost:5050 '} 14 /> 15 </ div > 16 ); 17 } 18 export default App; Self-hosted installation We provide a docker image.Install YoBulk on your server and do a quick try.. # Clone the YoBulk repository git clone https://github.com/yobulkdev/yobulkdev.git # Go to the repository folder cd yobulkdev # Start with docker compose and Check http://localhost:5050 docker-compose up -d Our Features Availiable GPT3 Integrated Intelligent column Mapping Framework to write own validation rules Docker support No Code template generation Delightful error review experience Bring your own database YoBulk Backend API for Headless CSV importing Coming Soon Postgres and Mysql support 1 click data error fixing cloud and multi tenant hosting NLP models for self data correction WebHook for custom data processing Join Our Open Source Community YoBulk is an #OpenSource company Github Slack From Our Customers Yobulk was able to import large CSVs with million records and as an open-source platform, it can be deployed on-premises. It is a perfect fit for the finance domain where data security and privacy are of utmost importance. We tried Flatfile.com on-premises, but it did not work for us. Filipe Garcia CTO, Elucidate Building any import functionality within a SaaS application is a hard problem that we encountered ourselves within NocoDB. And its pretty remarkable that being such a developer centric problem there is not even a single open source product that is trying to solve this gigantic problem in a fundamental way. Yobulk have stretched the frontiers with being not just being developer centric & open-source approach to this problem but also with their unique AI first approach to solve this problem. Naveen R Founder, NocoDB Docs Docs Community Slack Twitter More GitHub

column4: The ConeLedger platform is an upcoming cloud-based ERP solution that offers advanced customization and scripting capabilities to meet the unique needs of any business. It is an ideal option for companies that require more functionality than basic cloud accounting software, but don't want to pay the high cost of traditional ERP systems. A platform preview is expected to be available soon, and if you or your company have any questions, please feel free to reach out to everyone@coneledger.com.
column6: coneledger.com Search this site Embedded Files The Cloud Accounting & ERP Platform that puts end-user customization capabilities first The ConeLedger platform is an upcoming cloud-based ERP solution that offers advanced customization and scripting capabilities to meet the unique needs of any business. It is an ideal option for companies that require more functionality than basic cloud accounting software, but don't want to pay the high cost of traditional ERP systems. A platform preview is expected to be available soon, and if you or your company have any questions, please feel free to reach out to tyler@coneledger.com directly. 202 5-Q1 Updates! ConeLedger Inc. Announces Closed Beta Program ConeLedger Inc. is intending to launch a closed beta program later this year and is currently inviting a select number of businesses to participate. Participants will receive early access to our pre-release platform, providing an opportunity to influence key features and improvements ahead of the public release. Program Details: Cost Structure : Participants will be billed at cost (e.g., compute expenses) but we remain open to alternative arrangements. Objective : The program's primary goal is to identify and address potential issues while incorporating your valuable insights, ensuring the final product is highly relevant and beneficial to businesses everywhere. Secondary goals include identifying appropriate limits and controls on server-side execution of end-user written scripting solutions that can be readily deployed throughout a given tenant's instance. To express interest or request further information, please contact Tyler at tyler@coneledger.com. We look forward to collaborating with you to shape the future of this platform. Tyler March 31, 2025 2024 Updates! Pardon the lack of updates so far this year. The past several months were dedicated to a complete rewrite of several core systems which reflected a paradigm change in ConeLedger's approach to its multi-tenant implementation of stateless workers & orchestrators; pleased to report significant performance improvements as a result. Other updates implemented this year included: Revamped approach to custom user permissions. ASC330; Location level inventory tracking with automated inventory valuation and COGS calculation based on costing layers which support FIFO, LIFO or Average Cost configurations. Expanded systems for Transaction Type specific transforms & Transaction Line Level Link that are now customizable (applies to both links of the account/amount & item/quantity nature). Programmable SMS & Email via flow-chart based automation designer as well as through the server-side platform scripting (ConeCode User Scripts). Decoupled User Logins from Platform Instance's & their licenses (If more than one company has provisioned your email with a user license, you can switch between instances without logging into a different account). The navigation menu items are customizable directly now via various context menus and drag/drop capability. Major custom reporting / Saved Search improvement (integration with various features system-wide, edit records directly from search results, new search caching enabled unsaved search sharing). Multi-selects are now a Custom Field Type available as part of the ConeLedger's native platform customization capabilities. ASC606; Experimental native support for performance obligation management, delivery tracking & revenue recognition automation. Thank you for your continued patience! tyler@coneledger.com - 5/1/2024 2023 Updates! Build & Publish Custom Dashboards Powered by Custom Searches! Create Custom Records, Transaction Types, Fields, Forms, ect Apply Transactions to Other Transactions Write Custom Scripts & Deploy them Server-side using a Flowchart-like editor to Automate Business Workflows A Seperate Reporting Module was Created Specifically for Canned Financial Reports (Use Custom Saved Searches for everything else) All Record Types Now Have an Audit Trail for Field Updates & Workflow Operations *Search as you type Global Search New Form Customization System Implemented Google Sites Report abuse Page details Page updated Google Sites Report abuse
